translation.medium: 我们保证百分之百的顾客满意!
translation.reference: 我们至今维持着 100% 的客户满意度！

translation.en: Your feedback is very important to us.
translation.zh: 您的反馈对我们非常重要。
translation.source: Your feedback is very important to us.
translation.medium: 您的反馈非常重要我们。
translation.reference: 您的反馈对我们非常重要。

translation.en: When you receive the item, please leave us positive feedback.
translation.zh: 您在收到商品后，如果满意，请给我们一个好评。
translation.source: When you receive the item, please leave us positive feedback.
translation.medium: 谢谢你们的支持!
translation.reference: 您在收到商品后，如果满意，请给我们一个好评。

translation.en: Positive feedback is greatly appreciated, and we will also leave you positive feedback.
translation.zh: 我们感谢您的好评，同时我们也会给您好评。
translation.source: Positive feedback is greatly appreciated, and we will also leave you positive feedback.
translation.medium: 如果你满意我们的服务，请给我们个好评价吧。
translation.reference: 我们感谢您的好评，同时我们也会给您好评。

translation.en: If you are unhappy for any reason, please do not leave medium or negative Feedback.
translation.zh: 如果您因任何原因感到不满意，请不要给予中评或差评。
translation.source: If you are unhappy for any reason, please do not leave medium or negative Feedback.
translation.medium: 如果不满任何理由,请不要离开中性或者消极的反馈。
translation.reference: 如果您因任何原因感到不满意，请不要给予中评或差评。

translation.en: Give us a chance, and we will give our best.
translation.zh: 给我们一个帮您解决问题的机会。
translation.source: Give us a chance, and we will give our best.
translation.medium: 给我们一个机会,我们会全力以赴
translation.reference: 给我们一个帮您解决问题的机会。

translation.en: We will quickly address the problem and give you a satisfactory answer.
translation.zh: 我们会尽快处理您遇到的问题，给您一个满意的答复。
translation.source: We will quickly address the problem and give you a satisfactory answer.
translation.medium: 我们会迅速解决问题并给您一个满意的答复。
translation.reference: 我们会尽快处理您遇到的问题，给您一个满意的答复。

translation.en: I will be more than happy to assist you.
translation.zh: 我很高兴能帮到您。
translation.source: I will be more than happy to assist you.
translation.medium: 我乐于助你
translation.reference: 我很高兴能帮到您。

translation.en: Please allow me a few moments to verify your information
translation.zh: 请给我几分钟时间，我先验证您的信息。
translation.source: Please allow me a few moments to verify your information
translation.medium: 我需要一些时间来核对你的资料
translation.reference: 请给我几分钟时间，我先验证您的信息。

translation.en: In this case what you can try is connecting the device using different USB cords.
translation.zh: 在这种情况下，您可以尝试使用不同的 USB 线连接设备。
translation.source: In this case what you can try is connecting the device using different USB cords.
translation.medium: 您可以尝试使用不同的USB线连接设备。
translation.reference: 在这种情况下，您可以尝试使用不同的 USB 线连接设备。

translation.en: Any generic micro-USB cord should work.
translation.zh: 任何普通的 Micro-USB 线都可以使用。
translation.source: Any generic micro-USB cord should work.
translation.medium: 任何一种通用微型USB线都可以用
translation.reference: 任何普通的 Micro-USB 线都可以使用。

translation.en: Also, please try using different USB ports in your computer
translation.zh: 此外，请尝试使用电脑上的不同 USB 端口。
translation.source: Also, please try using different USB ports in your computer
translation.medium: 另外，请尝试使用您电脑的不同USB端口
translation.reference: 此外，请尝试使用电脑上的不同 USB 端口。

translation.en: From which country do you deliver?
translation.zh: 您从哪个国家发货？
translation.source: From which country do you deliver?
translation.medium: 您从哪国发货?
translation.reference: 您从哪个国家发货？

translation.en: When is the package with us?
translation.zh: 我们什么时候能收到包裹？
translation.source: When is the package with us?
translation.medium: 什么时候我们才能收到包裹?
translation.reference: 我们什么时候能收到包裹？

translation.en: They have many thanks for their help.
translation.zh: 他们对获得的帮助表示感谢。
translation.source: They have many thanks for their help.
translation.medium: 我很感激他们的帮助。
translation.reference: 他们对获得的帮助表示感谢。

translation.en: Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat.
translation.zh: 感谢您今天抽出时间与我交谈，希望我的答复能让您满意，如果您能抽空对我的客户服务技能进行评价，我将非常感激，评价按钮就在本次聊天中。
translation.source: Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat.
translation.medium: 谢谢你花时间和我交谈,我希望我解决了你的问题,如果你不介意,今天的聊天评分我的客服技能,我会非常感激的,评分按钮在这个聊天中。
translation.reference: 感谢您今天抽出时间与我交谈，希望我的答复能让您满意，如果您能抽空对我的客户服务技能进行评价，我将非常感激，评价按钮就在本次聊天中。

translation.en: Regrettably the prices of the items are as they show online, we cannot change or reduce this for you
translation.zh: 遗憾的是，这些商品的价格正如网上所示，我们无法改价或降价
translation.source: Regrettably the prices of the items are as they show online, we cannot change or reduce this for you
translation.medium: 不幸的是,这些商品的价格是正如在网上显示,我们不能为您更改或减少这一点,
translation.reference: 遗憾的是，这些商品的价格正如网上所示，我们无法改价或降价

translation.en: The lead times are as advertised on the website.
translation.zh: 交货期如网站上所示。
translation.source: The lead times are as advertised on the website.
translation.medium: 交货时间按网站上的说明。
translation.reference: 交货期如网站上所示。

translation.en: As we do not carry stock then all items are made to order, shipped on to us here at #URL# and then sent onto yourselves.
translation.zh: 因为我们没有库存，所有商品均为定做，运到我们这里 (#URL#)，再邮寄给您。
translation.source: As we do not carry stock then all items are made to order, shipped on to us here at #URL# and then sent onto yourselves.
translation.medium: 由于我们没有库存,所以所有的物品都是按照您的要求生产,然后通过#URL#寄给您。
translation.reference: 因为我们没有库存，所有商品均为定做，运到我们这里 (#URL#)，再邮寄给您。

translation.en: That is why we ask that you allow these lead times please.
translation.zh: 这就是我们要求留出备货期的原因。
translation.source: That is why we ask that you allow these lead times please.
translation.medium: 因此我们要求您允许我们这样做。
translation.reference: 这就是我们要求留出备货期的原因。

translation.en: The lead time showing is when the next batch is due to arrive.
translation.zh: 备货期显示的是下一批货物到货的时间。
translation.source: The lead time showing is when the next batch is due to arrive.
translation.medium: 显示的领先时间是下一批货物应当到达的时间。
translation.reference: 备货期显示的是下一批货物到货的时间。

translation.en: I try to call the rider but he does not understand me.
translation.zh: 我试着呼叫骑手了，但他不明白我的意思。
translation.source: I try to call the rider but he does not understand me.
translation.medium: 我想给骑士打电话,但是他不理解我.
translation.reference: 我试着呼叫骑手了，但他不明白我的意思。

translation.en: That is why please call the rider once he is near to the address place on the order using the app
translation.zh: 因此，请在骑手快到达订单上的地点时，使用 App 呼叫他
translation.source: That is why please call the rider once he is near to the address place on the order using the app
translation.medium: 所以请骑手一旦靠近订单上的地址就打电话
translation.reference: 因此，请在骑手快到达订单上的地点时，使用 App 呼叫他

translation.en: Which titles a re you missing?
translation.zh: 您缺少哪些标题？
translation.source: Which titles a re you missing?
translation.medium: 您还需要哪些证书？
translation.reference: 您缺少哪些标题？

translation.en: Please follow the steps indicated below to perform a sync repair on your #PRS_ORG# (you will need a Wi-Fi connection before you start):
translation.zh: 请按照下面的步骤在您的 #PRS_ORG# 上执行同步修复（开始之前需要连接 Wi-Fi）：
translation.source: Please follow the steps indicated below to perform a sync repair on your #PRS_ORG# (you will need a Wi-Fi connection before you start):
translation.medium: 请按照以下步骤进行同步修复(您需要Wi-Fi连接，然后才能开始):
translation.reference: 请按照下面的步骤在您的 #PRS_ORG# 上执行同步修复（开始之前需要连接 Wi-Fi）：

translation.en: Go to your Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。
translation.source: Go to your Home screen.
translation.medium: 到您的主屏幕。
translation.reference: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap on the More icon at the bottom-right of the screen (3 horizontal lines).
translation.zh: 点击屏幕右下方的“更多”图标（3 条横线）。
translation.source: Tap on the More icon at the bottom-right of the screen (3 horizontal lines).
translation.medium: 在屏幕右下角(三个水平线)的更多标志上点击(3个水平线)。
translation.reference: 点击屏幕右下方的“更多”图标（3 条横线）。

translation.en: Tap Settings.
translation.zh: 点击“设置”。
translation.source: Tap Settings.
translation.medium: 查找设定。
translation.reference: 点击“设置”。

translation.en: Tap Device information.
translation.zh: 点击“设备信息”。
translation.source: Tap Device information.
translation.medium: 获取设备信息。
translation.reference: 点击“设备信息”。

translation.en: Beside Repair/restore your #PRS_ORG# account, tap Repair/Restore.
translation.zh: 点击“修复/恢复您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户”旁边的“修复/恢复”。
translation.source: Beside Repair/restore your #PRS_ORG# account, tap Repair/Restore.
translation.medium: 除了修复/恢复您的#PRS_ORG#, 触摸修复/恢复。
translation.reference: 点击“修复/恢复您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户”旁边的“修复/恢复”。

translation.en: Tap Repair now/Restore
translation.zh: 点击“立即修复/恢复”
translation.source: Tap Repair now/Restore
translation.medium: 现在修补/恢复
translation.reference: 点击“立即修复/恢复”

translation.en: When the syncing has completed, please tap again on Sync Now, to install any available upgrades.
translation.zh: 同步完成后，再次点击“立即同步”，以安装可用的升级。
translation.source: When the syncing has completed, please tap again on Sync Now, to install any available upgrades.
translation.medium: 同步完成后，请再次点击"同步"，安装可用的升级软件。
translation.reference: 同步完成后，再次点击“立即同步”，以安装可用的升级。

translation.en: Please let me know if you can download and open your book now
translation.zh: 如果您现在可以下载并打开图书了，请告诉我一声
translation.source: Please let me know if you can download and open your book now
translation.medium: 如果您现在可以下载并打开您的书请让我知道
translation.reference: 如果您现在可以下载并打开图书了，请告诉我一声

translation.en: Hi, are you still there?
translation.zh: 嗨，您还在吗？
translation.source: Hi, are you still there?
translation.medium: 嗨,你还在吗?
translation.reference: 嗨，您还在吗？

translation.en: We haven't heard from you.
translation.zh: 我们没有收到您的回复。
translation.source: We haven't heard from you.
translation.medium: 我们没听到你的消息
translation.reference: 我们没有收到您的回复。

translation.en: We may have gotten disconnected.
translation.zh: 我们联系不上了。
translation.source: We may have gotten disconnected.
translation.medium: 我们可能中断了联系
translation.reference: 我们联系不上了。

translation.en: I will be ending this chat session.
translation.zh: 我将结束本次聊天。
translation.source: I will be ending this chat session.
translation.medium: 我将会结束此次聊天会话。
translation.reference: 我将结束本次聊天。

translation.en: If you’re looking to get in touch with Customer Care again you can reach us at #URL# and a member of our team will be happy to assist you.
translation.zh: 如果您要再次联系客户服务部门，请访问 #URL#，我们团队随时为您服务。
translation.source: If you’re looking to get in touch with Customer Care again you can reach us at #URL# and a member of our team will be happy to assist you.
translation.medium: 如果您再次想联系客户服务,您可以拨打号码,我们的团队会很高兴为您服务。
translation.reference: 如果您要再次联系客户服务部门，请访问 #URL#，我们团队随时为您服务。

translation.en: For your information, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation.
translation.zh: 我将把我们的聊天记录发送给您，供您参考。
translation.source: For your information, I will be sending you a transcript of our conversation.
translation.medium: 我会把我们的对话录下来寄给你
translation.reference: 我将把我们的聊天记录发送给您，供您参考。

translation.en: Should you have any further questions or concerns, you can always reply back to that email and we will be able to assist you further.
translation.zh: 如果您有任何其他疑问或担忧，您可以随时回复邮件，我们很乐意继续帮助您。
translation.source: Should you have any further questions or concerns, you can always reply back to that email and we will be able to assist you further.
translation.medium: 如果您还有任何问题或疑问,可随时回复该邮件,我们将竭力为您服务。
translation.reference: 如果您有任何其他疑问或担忧，您可以随时回复邮件，我们很乐意继续帮助您。

translation.en: Thank you for contacting #PRS_ORG#, it was my pleasure to assist you today.
translation.zh: 感谢您联系 #PRS_ORG#，很高兴今天能帮到您。
translation.source: Thank you for contacting #PRS_ORG#, it was my pleasure to assist you today.
translation.medium: 感谢你联系了PRS_ORG,我很高兴为你服务。
translation.reference: 感谢您联系 #PRS_ORG#，很高兴今天能帮到您。

translation.en: I hope you have an excellent day.
translation.zh: 祝您度过美好的一天。
translation.source: I hope you have an excellent day.
translation.medium: 祝你愉快的一天。
translation.reference: 祝您度过美好的一天。

translation.en: Even if you don't know your password you can create a new password by following the steps I sent.
translation.zh: 即使您忘了密码，也可以按照我发送的步骤创建新密码。
translation.source: Even if you don't know your password you can create a new password by following the steps I sent.
translation.medium: 即使您不知道您的密码，您也可以按照我寄送的步骤创建新密码。
translation.reference: 即使您忘了密码，也可以按照我发送的步骤创建新密码。

translation.en: But don't worry, I can also send the link to reset your password
translation.zh: 别担心，我还可以发送密码重置链接
translation.source: But don't worry, I can also send the link to reset your password
translation.medium: 但不用担心,我也能发送重设密码的链接
translation.reference: 别担心，我还可以发送密码重置链接

translation.en: How was the farewell to Etho was like?
translation.zh: 与 Etho 的告别是怎样的？
translation.source: How was the farewell to Etho was like?
translation.medium: 跟伊索告别是什么样的?
translation.reference: 与 Etho 的告别是怎样的？

translation.en: First of a quick disclaimer: I am not the account user but her wife.
translation.zh: 第一项简单声明：我不是账号使用者，而是他的妻子。
translation.source: First of a quick disclaimer: I am not the account user but her wife.
translation.medium: 很快的声明:我不是那个账户的用户,而是他的妻子。
translation.reference: 第一项简单声明：我不是账号使用者，而是他的妻子。

translation.en: I have permission to use this account because I just suck at tech and it kind of helps me with mental health issues (and I do see the irony of a technophobe asking about the redstone titan :P)
translation.zh: 我有权使用这个账号，因为我是个技术盲，它在某种程度上可以帮助我疏导心理（我确实看到过一个技术恐惧者询问红石巨人的讽刺段子 :P）
translation.source: I have permission to use this account because I just suck at tech and it kind of helps me with mental health issues (and I do see the irony of a technophobe asking about the redstone titan :P)
translation.medium: 我得到了使用这个账户的许可是因为我真的很烂在科技方面,它有助于我与心理健康问题(我确实看到了技术恐惧症患者提问关于红石巨人的讽刺)
translation.reference: 我有权使用这个账号，因为我是个技术盲，它在某种程度上可以帮助我疏导心理（我确实看到过一个技术恐惧者询问红石巨人的讽刺段子 :P）

translation.en: Second and far more important disclaimer: I do not want to stir drama nor suspect something wasn't right.
translation.zh: 第二项，但也更为重要的声明：我不想挑起事端，也不想怀疑有什么不对劲。
translation.source: Second and far more important disclaimer: I do not want to stir drama nor suspect something wasn't right.
translation.medium: 第二个也更重要的声明:我不想制造戏剧,也不怀疑任何东西是不对的.
translation.reference: 第二项，但也更为重要的声明：我不想挑起事端，也不想怀疑有什么不对劲。

translation.en: Afaik it was just a change of wind that didn't suit everyone.
translation.zh: 我想这只是风向的变化，虽然它并不适合所有人。
translation.source: Afaik it was just a change of wind that didn't suit everyone.
translation.medium: 据我所知,只不过是风向变了,不是针对任何人的.
translation.reference: 我想这只是风向的变化，虽然它并不适合所有人。

translation.en: I'm just an old fan satisfying a nostalgia streak.
translation.zh: 我只是个怀旧的老粉丝。
translation.source: I'm just an old fan satisfying a nostalgia streak.
translation.medium: 我只是一个老粉丝满足他的怀旧之情
translation.reference: 我只是个怀旧的老粉丝。

translation.en: With that out of the way >.<...
translation.zh: 把这件事解决了 >.<...
translation.source: With that out of the way >.<...
translation.medium: 话说完后<...
translation.reference: 把这件事解决了 >.<...

translation.en: So I used to be a huge Mindcrack fan back in the day.
translation.zh: 我以前是 Mindcrack 的超级粉丝。
translation.source: So I used to be a huge Mindcrack fan back in the day.
translation.medium: 我以前是他们的粉丝
translation.reference: 我以前是 Mindcrack 的超级粉丝。

translation.en: Never missed a release from GuudeBoulderfist, loved the collabs, etc.
translation.zh: 我从未错过 GuudeBoulderfist 发布的内容，对联名款充满狂热等等
translation.source: Never missed a release from GuudeBoulderfist, loved the collabs, etc.
translation.medium: 从没错过古德的新品,很喜欢他和别人的合作等等.
translation.reference: 我从未错过 GuudeBoulderfist 发布的内容，对联名款充满狂热等等

translation.en: While watching a random YouTube feed, I came across a vid detailing Etho's channel history.
translation.zh: 在刷 YouTube 时，我看到了一段详细介绍 Etho 频道历史的视频。
translation.source: While watching a random YouTube feed, I came across a vid detailing Etho's channel history.
translation.medium: 在随机浏览YouTube的时候我看到了一段关于Etho频道历史的影像
translation.reference: 在刷 YouTube 时，我看到了一段详细介绍 Etho 频道历史的视频。

translation.en: Near the end, it touched on the Mindcrack going commercial.
translation.zh: 临近结尾时，它提到了 Mindcrack 的商业化。
translation.source: Near the end, it touched on the Mindcrack going commercial.
translation.medium: 其中提到了MyndCrack的商业化
translation.reference: 临近结尾时，它提到了 Mindcrack 的商业化。

translation.en: How he didn't see it in positive light and the inevitable refusal to sign the related contracts.
translation.zh: 提到了他不看好这件事，因此拒绝签署相关合同。
translation.source: How he didn't see it in positive light and the inevitable refusal to sign the related contracts.
translation.medium: 如何看到积极的一面,同时避免签订相关的合同.
translation.reference: 提到了他不看好这件事，因此拒绝签署相关合同。

translation.en: Again, neither going 'pro' nor wanting to keep it casual is a wrong decision and I know people go in different directions and such.
translation.zh: 再次强调，追求“专业”或者保持“随意”都不是错误的决定，要知道人各有志。
translation.source: Again, neither going 'pro' nor wanting to keep it casual is a wrong decision and I know people go in different directions and such.
translation.medium: 同样我也不认为专业选择和随意选择都是错误的。我知道人们的选择各有不同。
translation.reference: 再次强调，追求“专业”或者保持“随意”都不是错误的决定，要知道人各有志。

translation.en: Quick Google led me to this old thread which shows his side of things.
translation.zh: 我在谷歌上搜索了一通，知道了他的一些事情。
translation.source: Quick Google led me to this old thread which shows his side of things.
translation.medium: 谷歌快速搜索让我找到了这个老的帖子,它展示了他的一面。
translation.reference: 我在谷歌上搜索了一通，知道了他的一些事情。

translation.en: Mostly knowing things need to be carefully said, but what strikes most on face value is that you saw things in a different light but overall stayed on good terms.
translation.zh: 大多数人都知道要慎言，但最令人印象深刻的是，你从另一个角度看待事情，同时总体上保持良好的关系。
translation.source: Mostly knowing things need to be carefully said, but what strikes most on face value is that you saw things in a different light but overall stayed on good terms.
translation.medium: 大多数情况下,事情需要小心翼翼地说出来,但在表面看,你看到的是一种新的光芒,但总的来说,你保持着良好的关系.
translation.reference: 大多数人都知道要慎言，但最令人印象深刻的是，你从另一个角度看待事情，同时总体上保持良好的关系。

translation.en: This whole story happened after I moved on to other things myself, so it's all kind of new to me.
translation.zh: 整个故事都发生在我把兴趣转移到其他方面之后，所以我完全不知道这件事。
translation.source: This whole story happened after I moved on to other things myself, so it's all kind of new to me.
translation.medium: 整个故事发生在我自己转到其他事物后所以对我来说都是新的
translation.reference: 整个故事都发生在我把兴趣转移到其他方面之后，所以我完全不知道这件事。

translation.en: What I am after is the other side of the picture?
translation.zh: 事情的另一面是什么样？
translation.source: What I am after is the other side of the picture?
translation.medium: 我想知道的是这个案件的另一面吗
translation.reference: 事情的另一面是什么样？

translation.en: As I said, my mental health isn't stellar, and seeing an old group I was attached to as a fan parting ways without some dumb explosions that are all too common in the polarized public discourse could be kinda nice and stuff.
translation.zh: 我之前说过，我的心态不是很好，看到我曾经喜欢的一个老团体分道扬镳的时候并没有互撕，可能是一件好事。
translation.source: As I said, my mental health isn't stellar, and seeing an old group I was attached to as a fan parting ways without some dumb explosions that are all too common in the polarized public discourse could be kinda nice and stuff.
translation.medium: 正如我所说,我的精神健康不是很好,而且看到一个老的团体我一直都很喜欢看他们的比赛而现在他们要分开了没有一些愚蠢的爆炸这在两极分化的公共讨论中是相当常见的
translation.reference: 我之前说过，我的心态不是很好，看到我曾经喜欢的一个老团体分道扬镳的时候并没有互撕，可能是一件好事。

translation.en: So how was the response from 'the old gang'?
translation.zh: “老帮派”的反应如何？
translation.source: So how was the response from 'the old gang'?
translation.medium: 那么"旧帮"的反应如何?
translation.reference: “老帮派”的反应如何？

translation.en: Did you keep doing stuff together?
translation.zh: 你们还合作吗？
translation.source: Did you keep doing stuff together?
translation.medium: 你们还一起做事情吗?
translation.reference: 你们还合作吗？

translation.en: Did you slowly drift apart?
translation.zh: 你们是不是慢慢疏远了？
translation.source: Did you slowly drift apart?
translation.medium: 是不是渐渐疏远了?
translation.reference: 你们是不是慢慢疏远了？

translation.en: Still chat or invite one another to events?
translation.zh: 还有聊天或邀请对方参加活动吗？
translation.source: Still chat or invite one another to events?
translation.medium: 还能聊天或者邀请对方参加活动吗?
translation.reference: 还有聊天或邀请对方参加活动吗？

translation.en: Again, I'm not expecting anything dramatic or to see people at each other's throats.
translation.zh: 再说一遍，我不希望发生什么戏剧性的事情或者看到人们互相掐架。
translation.source: Again, I'm not expecting anything dramatic or to see people at each other's throats.
translation.medium: 我不指望任何戏剧性的事也不指望人们相互撕扯
translation.reference: 再说一遍，我不希望发生什么戏剧性的事情或者看到人们互相掐架。

translation.en: Kinda the opposite.
translation.zh: 与此相反，
translation.source: Kinda the opposite.
translation.medium: 正好相反
translation.reference: 与此相反，

translation.en: I guess in a way, a form of low-key closure of something kinda small in my life to reflect a bit of positivity on my own mentally troubled butt.
translation.zh: 低调地结束生命中的一件小事，这多少能映射出我对自己心理问题表现出的积极方面。
translation.source: I guess in a way, a form of low-key closure of something kinda small in my life to reflect a bit of positivity on my own mentally troubled butt.
translation.medium: 我想从某种程度上来说,形成了低调的结局,在我生命中的一些小东西,以反映一些积极的东西在我自己的精神有问题的屁股。
translation.reference: 低调地结束生命中的一件小事，这多少能映射出我对自己心理问题表现出的积极方面。

translation.en: P.S. I couldn't help but see the charity fund raiser you had and the buttloads you collected.
translation.zh: 附言：我没有忍住，去看了你的慈善基金募集人，知道你募集到了大量资金。
translation.source: P.S. I couldn't help but see the charity fund raiser you had and the buttloads you collected.
translation.medium: 我不禁想到你举办的慈善募捐活动以及你所募集到的大量善款
translation.reference: 附言：我没有忍住，去看了你的慈善基金募集人，知道你募集到了大量资金。

translation.en: That's awesome as heck!
translation.zh: 真好！
translation.source: That's awesome as heck!
translation.medium: 真他妈神了
translation.reference: 真好！

translation.en: I apologize but we are unable to change the address once it has been placed already.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉，但下单后，我们就无法改地址了。
translation.source: I apologize but we are unable to change the address once it has been placed already.
translation.medium: 抱歉，但是已经安排好的送货地址不能更改。
translation.reference: 我很抱歉，但下单后，我们就无法改地址了。

translation.en: In this case, what I suggest is you can call the rider once he is nearby already for you to be able to amend the address.
translation.zh: 在这种情况下，我的建议是，在骑手到达附近时呼叫骑手，然后就能改地址了。
translation.source: In this case, what I suggest is you can call the rider once he is nearby already for you to be able to amend the address.
translation.medium: 在这种情况下,我建议您在快递员赶到的时候给他打电话,这样您就可以更改地址。
translation.reference: 在这种情况下，我的建议是，在骑手到达附近时呼叫骑手，然后就能改地址了。

translation.en: To do this, simply access your order page, tap 'Help and support' and choose the option 'Call rider'.
translation.zh: 只需进入您的订单页面，点击“帮助与支持”，然后选择“呼叫骑手”选项。
translation.source: To do this, simply access your order page, tap 'Help and support' and choose the option 'Call rider'.
translation.medium: 想退订的用户请访问订阅页面,点击"帮助和支持"并选择"取消订阅"。
translation.reference: 只需进入您的订单页面，点击“帮助与支持”，然后选择“呼叫骑手”选项。

translation.en: did you sign out and sign in on your app?
translation.zh: 您从 App 注销并登录了吗？
translation.source: did you sign out and sign in on your app?
translation.medium: 你在App上签了字吗?
translation.reference: 您从 App 注销并登录了吗？

translation.en: did you do the 2 procedures?
translation.zh: 这两个过程都完成了吗？
translation.source: did you do the 2 procedures?
translation.medium: 你做了两个项目?
translation.reference: 这两个过程都完成了吗？

translation.en: if you did both procedures and didn't solve the issue I can refund the money to your Store Credit account.
translation.zh: 如果这两个过程都执行了，仍然不能解决问题，我可以向您的 Store Credit 帐户退款。
translation.source: if you did both procedures and didn't solve the issue I can refund the money to your Store Credit account.
translation.medium: 如果您完成了上述两个步骤但问题仍未解决我可以将款项退还至您的商店信用账户
translation.reference: 如果这两个过程都执行了，仍然不能解决问题，我可以向您的 Store Credit 帐户退款。

translation.en: that way you can buy the book of your choice immedialtrely.
translation.zh: 这样您可以立即购买自己选择的图书。
translation.source: that way you can buy the book of your choice immedialtrely.
translation.medium: 这样您就可以立即购买您所选的书。
translation.reference: 这样您可以立即购买自己选择的图书。

translation.en: would that be okay
translation.zh: 这样可以吗
translation.source: would that be okay
translation.medium: 可以吗
translation.reference: 这样可以吗

translation.en: are you there?
translation.zh: 您还在吗？
translation.source: are you there?
translation.medium: 你在吗?
translation.reference: 您还在吗？

translation.en: for quality purposes i will have to release this chat if there is no interaction in the next 2 minutes
translation.zh: 如果您在接下来的 2 分钟内没有回应，为了提高服务质量，我将结束本次聊天
translation.source: for quality purposes i will have to release this chat if there is no interaction in the next 2 minutes
translation.medium: 为了保证质量,如果在接下来的2分钟内没有互动,我将会公开这段聊天
translation.reference: 如果您在接下来的 2 分钟内没有回应，为了提高服务质量，我将结束本次聊天

translation.en: Thank you for contacting #PRS_ORG#, it was my pleasure to assist you today.
translation.zh: 感谢您联系 #PRS_ORG#，很高兴今天能帮到您。
translation.source: Thank you for contacting #PRS_ORG#, it was my pleasure to assist you today.
translation.medium: 感谢你联系了PRS_ORG,我很高兴为你服务。
translation.reference: 感谢您联系 #PRS_ORG#，很高兴今天能帮到您。

translation.en: I hope you have an excellent day.
translation.zh: 祝您度过美好的一天。
translation.source: I hope you have an excellent day.
translation.medium: 祝你愉快的一天。
translation.reference: 祝您度过美好的一天。

translation.en: The VP−730 is a 9−input scaler/switcher for analog video, digital video, balance stereo and S/PDIF audio signals.
translation.zh: VP-730 是一个 9 路输入的缩放器/切换器，用于模拟视频、数字视频、平衡立体声和 S/PDIF 音频信号。
translation.source: The VP−730 is a 9−input scaler/switcher for analog video, digital video, balance stereo and S/PDIF audio signals.
translation.medium: VP-730是一个为模拟视频、数字视频、制衡立体声和S/PDIF音频信号提供9个输入的比例器/切换器。
translation.reference: VP-730 是一个 9 路输入的缩放器/切换器，用于模拟视频、数字视频、平衡立体声和 S/PDIF 音频信号。

translation.en: It up− or down−scales composite, s−Video (Y/C), component video (YUV), HDMI, computer graphics video and JPEG files to a selectable computer graphics video or HDTV output resolution on identical outputs − one HDMI and two 15−pin HD.
translation.zh: 它可在相同的输出（一路 HDMI 和两路 15 针高清）中将合成视频、s−视频 (Y/C)、分量视频 (YUV)、HDMI、计算机图形视频和 JPEG 文件缩放到一个可选择的计算机图形视频或 HDTV 输出分辨率。
translation.source: It up− or down−scales composite, s−Video (Y/C), component video (YUV), HDMI, computer graphics video and JPEG files to a selectable computer graphics video or HDTV output resolution on identical outputs − one HDMI and two 15−pin HD.
translation.medium: 它将复合信号、S-视频(Y/C)、组成视频(YUV)、HDMI、计算机图形视频和JPEG文件放大或缩小，并将放大或缩小的视频输出到选择的计算机图形或HDTV的分辨率。
translation.reference: 它可在相同的输出（一路 HDMI 和两路 15 针高清）中将合成视频、s−视频 (Y/C)、分量视频 (YUV)、HDMI、计算机图形视频和 JPEG 文件缩放到一个可选择的计算机图形视频或 HDTV 输出分辨率。

translation.en: It includes a power amplifier to drive loudspeakers.
translation.zh: 它包括一个用于驱动扬声器的功率放大器。
translation.source: It includes a power amplifier to drive loudspeakers.
translation.medium: 它包括一个声压放大器以驱动扬声器。
translation.reference: 它包括一个用于驱动扬声器的功率放大器。

translation.en: The unit provides glitch−free switching between sources through FTBTM (fade−thru−black) switching technology.
translation.zh: 该装置通过 FTBTM（淡入淡出）切换技术实现源间无故障切换。
translation.source: The unit provides glitch−free switching between sources through FTBTM (fade−thru−black) switching technology.
translation.medium: 该设备通过Fade-thru-黑切换技术提供来自不同信号源之间的切换，并且不会发生断开现象。
translation.reference: 该装置通过 FTBTM（淡入淡出）切换技术实现源间无故障切换。

translation.en: HQV® Video Processing - HQV (Hollywood Quality Video) processing represents the state−of−the−art in video processing technology, with the highest quality de−interlacing (with 3:2 & 2:2 pull down), noise reduction, and scaling performance for both standard−definition and high−definition signals.
translation.zh: HQV® 视频处理 - HQV（好莱坞质量视频）处理代表了视频处理技术的最高水平，具有最高质量的去隔行（3:2 和 2:2 下拉）、降噪，以及标准清晰度和高清晰度信号的缩放性能。
translation.source: HQV® Video Processing - HQV (Hollywood Quality Video) processing represents the state−of−the−art in video processing technology, with the highest quality de−interlacing (with 3:2 & 2:2 pull down), noise reduction, and scaling performance for both standard−definition and high−definition signals.
translation.medium: HQV® Video处理技术 - HQV (好莱坞质量视频) 处理代表了视频处理技术领域中的最新进展，具有最高质量的交织排序（带有3：2和2：2拉下）、噪声减少以及对标准和高清晰度信号进行放大的能力。
translation.reference: HQV® 视频处理 - HQV（好莱坞质量视频）处理代表了视频处理技术的最高水平，具有最高质量的去隔行（3:2 和 2:2 下拉）、降噪，以及标准清晰度和高清晰度信号的缩放性能。

translation.en: Fade-Thru-Black (FTBTM) Switching - The video fades to black and then the new input fades from black for smooth, glitch−free switching.
translation.zh: 淡入淡出 (FTBTM) 切换 - 视频渐黑，然后新输入渐显，实现平滑的无故障切换。
translation.source: Fade-Thru-Black (FTBTM) Switching - The video fades to black and then the new input fades from black for smooth, glitch−free switching.
translation.medium: 渐暗转黑（FTBTM）切换技术 - 使用渐暗切换到黑色，然后新的输入信号从黑色中渐渐显现，做到了平滑无抖动的切换。
translation.reference: 淡入淡出 (FTBTM) 切换 - 视频渐黑，然后新输入渐显，实现平滑的无故障切换。

translation.en: The output signal provides constant sync so the display never glitches.
translation.zh: 输出信号提供持续同步，所以显示始终不会出现故障。
translation.source: The output signal provides constant sync so the display never glitches.
translation.medium: 输出信号提供稳定的同步,这样显示器就不会闪烁.
translation.reference: 输出信号提供持续同步，所以显示始终不会出现故障。

translation.en: K-IIT XLTM Picture-in-Picture Image Insertion Technology - Ultra stable picture−in−picture, picture−and−picture, and split screen capability.
translation.zh: K-IIT XLTM 图中图插入技术 - 超稳定的图中图、图带图和分屏能力。
translation.source: K-IIT XLTM Picture-in-Picture Image Insertion Technology - Ultra stable picture−in−picture, picture−and−picture, and split screen capability.
translation.medium: K－IIT XLTM 图像内嵌技术 - 超稳定的图像内嵌、图像和图像及分屏功能。
translation.reference: K-IIT XLTM 图中图插入技术 - 超稳定的图中图、图带图和分屏能力。

translation.en: Any video source can be inserted into or positioned next to a computer graphics video source or vice versa with window positioning and sizing controls.
translation.zh: 使用窗口定位和大小控件，可将任何视频源插入到计算机图形视频源中或放置在其旁边，反之亦然。
translation.source: Any video source can be inserted into or positioned next to a computer graphics video source or vice versa with window positioning and sizing controls.
translation.medium: 计算机图形视频源或其它任何视频源都可以被插入或安放在电脑的旁边。通过窗口定位和规定大小的控制。
translation.reference: 使用窗口定位和大小控件，可将任何视频源插入到计算机图形视频源中或放置在其旁边，反之亦然。

translation.en: Video Inputs - 2 universal video each on 3 BNC (composite, s−Video, component), 4 computer graphics/component video (15−pin HD), 2 HDMI and 1 USB (for JPEG data).
translation.zh: 视频输入 - 每 3 个 BNC 上 2 路通用视频（复合视频、s−视频、分量视频），4 个计算机图形/分量视频（15 针高清)，2 个 HDMI 和 1 个 USB（用于 JPEG 数据）。
translation.source: Video Inputs - 2 universal video each on 3 BNC (composite, s−Video, component), 4 computer graphics/component video (15−pin HD), 2 HDMI and 1 USB (for JPEG data).
translation.medium: 视频输入 - 2个通用视频输入，每个都有3个BNC (复合、s-视频、组成部分)、4个计算机图形/组成视频输入 (15－引脚的HD)、2个HDMI和1个USB (用于JPEG数据)。
translation.reference: 视频输入 - 每 3 个 BNC 上 2 路通用视频（复合视频、s−视频、分量视频），4 个计算机图形/分量视频（15 针高清)，2 个 HDMI 和 1 个 USB（用于 JPEG 数据）。

translation.en: HDCP Compliant - The HDCP (High Definition Content Protection) license agreement allows copy−protected data on the HDMI input to pass only to the HDMI output.
translation.zh: 与 HDCP 兼容 - HDCP（高清内容保护）许可协议允许 HDMI 输入端的拷贝保护数据只传递到 HDMI 输出端。
translation.source: HDCP Compliant - The HDCP (High Definition Content Protection) license agreement allows copy−protected data on the HDMI input to pass only to the HDMI output.
translation.medium: HDCP 一致 - 高清晰度内容保护许可协议允许来自高清晰度输出的数据在高清晰度输入流通过。
translation.reference: 与 HDCP 兼容 - HDCP（高清内容保护）许可协议允许 HDMI 输入端的拷贝保护数据只传递到 HDMI 输出端。

translation.en: Multiple Aspect Ratio Selections - 4x3 or 16x9, anamorphic, letterbox, and user definable settings.
translation.zh: 多宽高比选择 - 4x3 或 16x9、变形、上下黑边和用户自定义设置。
translation.source: Multiple Aspect Ratio Selections - 4x3 or 16x9, anamorphic, letterbox, and user definable settings.
translation.medium: 多种比例选择 - 4x3或16x9、变形、信封、及用户可定义的设定。
translation.reference: 多宽高比选择 - 4x3 或 16x9、变形、上下黑边和用户自定义设置。

translation.en: Companion AFV (Audio-Follow-Video) - For every analog video input, supports embedded audio on the 2 HDMI inputs and outputs.
translation.zh: Companion AFV（影音相随）- 对于每个模拟视频输入，支持 2 路 HDMI 输入和输出上的嵌入音频。
translation.source: Companion AFV (Audio-Follow-Video) - For every analog video input, supports embedded audio on the 2 HDMI inputs and outputs.
translation.medium: 伴侣AFV(音频跟随视频) - 每一个模拟视频输入,支持嵌入音频在2个HDMI输入和输出。
translation.reference: Companion AFV（影音相随）- 对于每个模拟视频输入，支持 2 路 HDMI 输入和输出上的嵌入音频。

translation.en: Audio Inputs - 6 balanced or S/PDIF audio (each selectable) on terminal blocks, one for each of the 2 universal video and 4 computer graphics video inputs.
translation.zh: 音频输入 - 端子板的 6 路平衡或 S/PDIF 音频（每个均可选），每个用于 2 路通用视频和 4 路计算机图形视频输入。
translation.source: Audio Inputs - 6 balanced or S/PDIF audio (each selectable) on terminal blocks, one for each of the 2 universal video and 4 computer graphics video inputs.
translation.medium: 音频输入 - 6个平衡的或S/PDIF音频 (每个可选)在终端块,一个为每个的2个通用的视频和4个计算机图形视频输入。
translation.reference: 音频输入 - 端子板的 6 路平衡或 S/PDIF 音频（每个均可选），每个用于 2 路通用视频和 4 路计算机图形视频输入。

translation.en: Built-in ProcAmp - Color, hue, sharpness, contrast, and brightness are set individually for each input.
translation.zh: 内置 ProcAmp - 分别为每路输入设置颜色、色度、清晰度、对比度和亮度。
translation.source: Built-in ProcAmp - Color, hue, sharpness, contrast, and brightness are set individually for each input.
translation.medium: 内置的ProCamp-每个输入的色彩、饱和度、锐度、对比度、亮度可单独设定。
translation.reference: 内置 ProcAmp - 分别为每路输入设置颜色、色度、清晰度、对比度和亮度。

translation.en: The unit has been fully tested across all inputs and outputs.
translation.zh: 该装置已针对所有输入和输出进行了全面测试。
translation.source: The unit has been fully tested across all inputs and outputs.
translation.medium: 已测试过各种输入和输出.
translation.reference: 该装置已针对所有输入和输出进行了全面测试。

translation.en: The unit will require an speaker output connector.
translation.zh: 该装置将需要一个扬声器输出连接器。
translation.source: The unit will require an speaker output connector.
translation.medium: 该部件需要一个扬声器输出连接器。
translation.reference: 该装置将需要一个扬声器输出连接器。

translation.en: Please follow the steps indicated below to perform a sync repair on your #PRS_ORG# (you will need a Wi-Fi connection before you start):
translation.zh: 请按照下面的步骤在您的 #PRS_ORG# 上执行同步修复（开始之前需要连接 Wi-Fi）：
translation.source: Please follow the steps indicated below to perform a sync repair on your #PRS_ORG# (you will need a Wi-Fi connection before you start):
translation.medium: 请按照以下步骤进行同步修复(您需要Wi-Fi连接，然后才能开始):
translation.reference: 请按照下面的步骤在您的 #PRS_ORG# 上执行同步修复（开始之前需要连接 Wi-Fi）：

translation.en: Go to your Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。
translation.source: Go to your Home screen.
translation.medium: 到您的主屏幕。
translation.reference: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap on the More icon at the bottom-right of the screen (3 horizontal lines).
translation.zh: 点击屏幕右下方的“更多”图标（3 条横线）。
translation.source: Tap on the More icon at the bottom-right of the screen (3 horizontal lines).
translation.medium: 在屏幕右下角(三个水平线)的更多标志上点击(3个水平线)。
translation.reference: 点击屏幕右下方的“更多”图标（3 条横线）。

translation.en: Tap Device information.
translation.zh: 点击“设备信息”。
translation.source: Tap Device information.
translation.medium: 获取设备信息。
translation.reference: 点击“设备信息”。

translation.en: Beside Repair/restore your #PRS_ORG# account, tap Repair/Restore.
translation.zh: 点击“修复/恢复您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户”旁边的“修复/恢复”。
translation.source: Beside Repair/restore your #PRS_ORG# account, tap Repair/Restore.
translation.medium: 除了修复/恢复您的#PRS_ORG#, 触摸修复/恢复。
translation.reference: 点击“修复/恢复您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户”旁边的“修复/恢复”。

translation.en: Tap Repair now/Restore
translation.zh: 点击“立即修复/恢复”
translation.source: Tap Repair now/Restore
translation.medium: 现在修补/恢复
translation.reference: 点击“立即修复/恢复”

translation.en: When the syncing has completed, please tap again on Sync Now, to install any available upgrades.
translation.zh: 同步完成后，再次点击“立即同步”，以安装可用的升级。
translation.source: When the syncing has completed, please tap again on Sync Now, to install any available upgrades.
translation.medium: 同步完成后，请再次点击"同步"，安装可用的升级软件。
translation.reference: 同步完成后，再次点击“立即同步”，以安装可用的升级。

translation.en: Thank you for your waiting time, I have checked the information into your account.
translation.zh: 谢谢您的等待，我已经查询到您的帐户信息了。
translation.source: Thank you for your waiting time, I have checked the information into your account.
translation.medium: 谢谢您一直以来的耐心，我已经把资料转到您的帐户了。
translation.reference: 谢谢您的等待，我已经查询到您的帐户信息了。

translation.en: I'm really sorry to know that you are having this issue with your eBook, but I'm willing to help you.
translation.zh: 对于您遇到的电子书问题，我觉得很抱歉，也希望能帮助到您。
translation.source: I'm really sorry to know that you are having this issue with your eBook, but I'm willing to help you.
translation.medium: 我很抱歉获悉您在使用电子书时遇到了这个问题,但我愿意帮助您.
translation.reference: 对于您遇到的电子书问题，我觉得很抱歉，也希望能帮助到您。

translation.en: I'll share with a couple of steps to perform into your device, okay?
translation.zh: 我将与您分享一些可在设备上执行的步骤。
translation.source: I'll share with a couple of steps to perform into your device, okay?
translation.medium: 我来告诉你一两个步骤,好吗?
translation.reference: 我将与您分享一些可在设备上执行的步骤。

translation.en: This macro extension tube set can be transform your lens into a macro lens.
translation.zh: 这个微距延长管套装可以把你的镜头变成一个微距镜头。
translation.source: This macro extension tube set can be transform your lens into a macro lens.
translation.medium: 该扩展管套可将你的镜头变成宏观镜头。
translation.reference: 这个微距延长管套装可以把你的镜头变成一个微距镜头。

translation.en: The set is consist of three tubes of different length, which can be used in any combination or individually to obtain the different magnification.
translation.zh: 这个套装包含三根不同长度的延长管，可以任意组合使用，也可以单独使用，以获得不同的放大倍率。
translation.source: The set is consist of three tubes of different length, which can be used in any combination or individually to obtain the different magnification.
translation.medium: 本套装由长短不一的三管组成,可任意组合使用或单管使用,获得不同的放大效果。
translation.reference: 这个套装包含三根不同长度的延长管，可以任意组合使用，也可以单独使用，以获得不同的放大倍率。

translation.en: The 3 individual rings can be used separately with the camera body mount and a lens adapter, and of course the magnification ratio will be different.
translation.zh: 这三个单独的环可以与相机机身和镜头适配器分开使用，当然放大倍率也会不同。
translation.source: The 3 individual rings can be used separately with the camera body mount and a lens adapter, and of course the magnification ratio will be different.
translation.medium: 3个单独的环可用于与相机机壳和光学镜头的配套使用，当然放大倍率也会有所不同。
translation.reference: 这三个单独的环可以与相机机身和镜头适配器分开使用，当然放大倍率也会不同。

translation.en: You have 8 ranges of different combinations.
translation.zh: 总共有 8 种不同的组合。
translation.source: You have 8 ranges of different combinations.
translation.medium: 你有八组不同组合。
translation.reference: 总共有 8 种不同的组合。

translation.en: Extension tubes are metal tubes with a rear-lens mount at one end and a camera-body mount at the other end.
translation.zh: 延长管是金属管，一端是后镜头支架，另一端是相机本体支架。
translation.source: Extension tubes are metal tubes with a rear-lens mount at one end and a camera-body mount at the other end.
translation.medium: 延长管是金属管，一端装有后视镜，另一端装有相机机壳。
translation.reference: 延长管是金属管，一端是后镜头支架，另一端是相机本体支架。

translation.en: The extension tube set does not affect image quality as there is no optics inside.
translation.zh: 延长管套装不影响图像质量，因为内部没有光学元件。
translation.source: The extension tube set does not affect image quality as there is no optics inside.
translation.medium: 由于内部没有光学元件，所以扩展管套并不会影响图像质量。
translation.reference: 延长管套装不影响图像质量，因为内部没有光学元件。

translation.en: No electronic contact and auto focus cannot be performed.
translation.zh: 不能执行电子接触和自动对焦。
translation.source: No electronic contact and auto focus cannot be performed.
translation.medium: 无法进行电子联系和自动聚焦。
translation.reference: 不能执行电子接触和自动对焦。

translation.en: Exposure and focus have to be adjusted manually.
translation.zh: 曝光和对焦必须手动调节。
translation.source: Exposure and focus have to be adjusted manually.
translation.medium: 曝光和聚焦必须手动调整。
translation.reference: 曝光和对焦必须手动调节。

translation.en: Set up camera and lens to manual mode, switch off and detach the lens;
translation.zh: 将相机和镜头设置为手动模式，关闭并分离镜头；
translation.source: Set up camera and lens to manual mode, switch off and detach the lens;
translation.medium: 将相机和镜头设置为手动模式，关闭镜头并把镜头拆卸下来；
translation.reference: 将相机和镜头设置为手动模式，关闭并分离镜头；

translation.en: Attach extension tube between the camera and lens
translation.zh: 将延长管连接到相机和镜头之间
translation.source: Attach extension tube between the camera and lens
translation.medium: 将扩展管连接摄像机和镜头
translation.reference: 将延长管连接到相机和镜头之间

translation.en: Put the object close to the lens and use a lot of light
translation.zh: 把物体靠近镜头，使用充足的光线
translation.source: Put the object close to the lens and use a lot of light
translation.medium: 把物体贴近镜头，并使用大量的光
translation.reference: 把物体靠近镜头，使用充足的光线

translation.en: When tubes are attached, you need to do all manually
translation.zh: 连接延长管时，需要手动完成所有操作
translation.source: When tubes are attached, you need to do all manually
translation.medium: 当管子连接时，你需要做的全部人工
translation.reference: 连接延长管时，需要手动完成所有操作

translation.en: and it is important that you use a lot of external light.
translation.zh: 必须要有充足的外部光线。
translation.source: and it is important that you use a lot of external light.
translation.medium: 并且务必要使用大量的外部光。
translation.reference: 必须要有充足的外部光线。

translation.en: If you don't do this in a bright environment, then you may have trouble to see the object through the viewfinder
translation.zh: 如果环境不够明亮，可能很难通过取景器看到物体
translation.source: If you don't do this in a bright environment, then you may have trouble to see the object through the viewfinder
translation.medium: 如果不能在明亮的环境中使用，您可能会在通过显微镜观察物体时出现视野不清晰的问题
translation.reference: 如果环境不够明亮，可能很难通过取景器看到物体

translation.zh: 我们会在你购买后尽快发货。
translation.source: Therefore, we can send the goods immediatelly and as soon as possible after purchasing them.
translation.medium: 因此，我们可以立即并在购买后尽快地发货。
translation.reference: 我们会在你购买后尽快发货。

translation.reference: 你必须通过 Paypal 系统付款。

translation.reference: 以下所示的银行卡都可以使用。

translation.medium: 皇家邮件跟踪24(1个工作日)大型和昂贵的货物
translation.reference: Royal Mail Tracked 24：大型及贵重物品（1 个工作日）

translation.reference: 请确保你的订单上的收货地址正确无误。

translation.en: We accept returns within 60 days from the date you received the purchase.
translation.zh: 在收货之日起 60 天内可以退货。
translation.source: We accept returns within 60 days from the date you received the purchase.
translation.medium: 我们接受退货，但必须在收到商品60天内。
translation.reference: 在收货之日起 60 天内可以退货。

translation.source: Customer satisfaction is very important to us.
translation.medium: 客户的满意是我们非常重视的事情。
translation.reference: 顾客的满意度对我们很重要。

translation.zh: 如果你的订单有任何问题，请与我们联系，我们将尽最大努力让你满意。
translation.source: If you have any problem with your order, please contact us and we will do our best to make you satisfied.
translation.medium: 如果您对订购的商品有任何问题，请联系我们，我们会尽力让您满意。
translation.reference: 如果你的订单有任何问题，请与我们联系，我们将尽最大努力让你满意。

translation.source: Please do not leave a negative feedback.
translation.medium: 请不要留下负面的反馈.
translation.reference: 请不要给差评。

translation.en: We guarantee that your issue will be solved quickly.
translation.zh: 我们保证会很快解决你的问题。
translation.source: We guarantee that your issue will be solved quickly.
translation.medium: 我们保证你的问题会很快解决。
translation.reference: 我们保证会很快解决你的问题。

translation.en: As long as you are happy with your purchase, please leave a positive feedback for us.
translation.zh: 如果你满意，请给我们一个好评。
translation.source: As long as you are happy with your purchase, please leave a positive feedback for us.
translation.medium: 只要你们对所购买的项目感到满意，请给我们留下积极的反馈。
translation.reference: 如果你满意，请给我们一个好评。

translation.en: Your feedback is very important to us.
translation.zh: 你的反馈对我们非常重要。
translation.source: Your feedback is very important to us.
translation.medium: 您的反馈非常重要我们。
translation.reference: 你的反馈对我们非常重要。

translation.medium: 我们会留下积极的反馈给你。
translation.reference: 我们也会给你积极的反馈。

translation.zh: 如果你有任何疑问，请随时通过 eBay 电子邮件系统与我们联系。
translation.source: If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us through the eBay emailing system.
translation.medium: 如果你有任何问题，请不要犹豫和我们联系。
translation.reference: 如果你有任何疑问，请随时通过 eBay 电子邮件系统与我们联系。

translation.en: We will try to reply as soon as possible during 24 hours.
translation.zh: 我们会尽量在 24 小时内回复。
translation.source: We will try to reply as soon as possible during 24 hours.
translation.medium: 我们会尽快在24小时之内给您答复。
translation.reference: 我们会尽量在 24 小时内回复。

translation.en: We hope you can give us the chance to improve our service and resolve any problems you might have.
translation.zh: 希望你能给我们改进服务的机会，解决你可能遇到的任何问题。
translation.source: We hope you can give us the chance to improve our service and resolve any problems you might have.
translation.medium: 我们希望您能给我们一次改进我们服务的机会和解决任何您可能有的问题。
translation.reference: 希望你能给我们改进服务的机会，解决你可能遇到的任何问题。

translation.en: The next step  is to sign out on your device.
translation.zh: 下一步是从设备注销。
translation.source: The next step  is to sign out on your device.
translation.medium: 下一步 是在您的设备上签出。
translation.reference: 下一步是从设备注销。

translation.en: Before doing it, I would like you to consider that any annotation that you have made in your books may be deleted, as well as filters, reading progress, downloads and other customization.
translation.zh: 在此之前，我得提醒您，您在书中所做的任何注释，以及筛选内容、阅读进度、下载内容和其他自定义设置都可能被删除。
translation.source: Before doing it, I would like you to consider that any annotation that you have made in your books may be deleted, as well as filters, reading progress, downloads and other customization.
translation.medium: 之前我想提醒您注意您所做的任何注解都可能被删除以及过滤器、阅读进度、下载和其它定制。
translation.reference: 在此之前，我得提醒您，您在书中所做的任何注释，以及筛选内容、阅读进度、下载内容和其他自定义设置都可能被删除。

translation.en: If you have third party ebooks, they may disappear
translation.zh: 如果您有第三方电子书，可能也会丢失
translation.source: If you have third party ebooks, they may disappear
translation.medium: 如果您有第三方电子书，它们可能会失踪
translation.reference: 如果您有第三方电子书，可能也会丢失

translation.en: are you on a page of a book?
translation.zh: 您打开图书了吗？
translation.source: are you on a page of a book?
translation.medium: 你是在一本书的扉页上吗
translation.reference: 您打开图书了吗？

translation.en: You can adjust the text size, fonts, line spacing, and justification to make reading easier on your eyes.
translation.zh: 您可以调整文本大小、字体、行间距和对齐方式，给您带来更舒适的阅读体验。
translation.source: You can adjust the text size, fonts, line spacing, and justification to make reading easier on your eyes.
translation.medium: 您可以调整文本的大小、字体、行距和排版以便于您阅读。
translation.reference: 您可以调整文本大小、字体、行间距和对齐方式，给您带来更舒适的阅读体验。

translation.en: While reading, tap the middle of your page to bring up the Reading Menu.
translation.zh: 看书时，点击页面中间可以显示阅读菜单。
translation.source: While reading, tap the middle of your page to bring up the Reading Menu.
translation.medium: 在阅读时，点击页面的中部来显示阅读菜单。
translation.reference: 看书时，点击页面中间可以显示阅读菜单。

translation.en: Tap the  Text icon.
translation.zh: 点击“文本”图标。
translation.source: Tap the  Text icon.
translation.medium: 文字图标。
translation.reference: 点击“文本”图标。

translation.en: Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat.
translation.zh: 感谢您今天抽出时间与我交谈，希望我的答复能让您满意，如果您能抽空对我的客户服务技能进行评价，我将非常感激，评价按钮就在本次聊天中。
translation.source: Thank you for taking the time to talk with me today and I hope I have managed to resolve your query, if you wouldn't mind rating our chat today based on my customer service skills I would really appreciate it, the rating button can be found on this chat.
translation.medium: 谢谢你花时间和我交谈,我希望我解决了你的问题,如果你不介意,今天的聊天评分我的客服技能,我会非常感激的,评分按钮在这个聊天中。
translation.reference: 感谢您今天抽出时间与我交谈，希望我的答复能让您满意，如果您能抽空对我的客户服务技能进行评价，我将非常感激，评价按钮就在本次聊天中。

translation.en: I hope you have a great day and please come back to us if you need any further assistance.
translation.zh: 祝您今天过得愉快，如果您需要其他帮助，请随时联系我们。
translation.source: I hope you have a great day and please come back to us if you need any further assistance.
translation.medium: 祝您愉快。如需要我们提供进一步帮助，请随时告诉我们。
translation.reference: 祝您今天过得愉快，如果您需要其他帮助，请随时联系我们。

translation.en: Please keep tapping where the images are showing, are you able to see the images and follow where to tap?
translation.zh: 请一直按住图片出现的位置，您是否看到了图片，能否点击指示的位置？
translation.source: Please keep tapping where the images are showing, are you able to see the images and follow where to tap?
translation.medium: 请你一直点击显示图片的地方。你能看到图片吗？你能看出该点击哪里吗？
translation.reference: 请一直按住图片出现的位置，您是否看到了图片，能否点击指示的位置？

translation.en: I will keep providing the images
translation.zh: 我会继续提供图片
translation.source: I will keep providing the images
translation.medium: 我会继续提供图像
translation.reference: 我会继续提供图片

translation.en: But please let me know if you were able to tap on your device where the images say
translation.zh: 但是，请您告诉我，您能否在设备上点击图片指示的位置
translation.source: But please let me know if you were able to tap on your device where the images say
translation.medium: 但是，请让我知道，如果你能按一下您的设备，其中显示
translation.reference: 但是，请您告诉我，您能否在设备上点击图片指示的位置

translation.en: It was prior to 2018.
translation.zh: 这是 2018 年之前的事了。
translation.source: It was prior to 2018.
translation.medium: 在2018年之前
translation.reference: 这是 2018 年之前的事了。

translation.en: I got stranded by US Air in Philadelphia instead of taking me all the way to Newark, and me and a dozen other people were trying to get cars late in the evening.
translation.zh: 我被困在了费城，我本该搭乘美国航空公司的飞机前往纽瓦克的，当时夜已经很深，我和其他十几个人都想租车。
translation.source: I got stranded by US Air in Philadelphia instead of taking me all the way to Newark, and me and a dozen other people were trying to get cars late in the evening.
translation.medium: 美国航空把我丢在费城,本来应该把我带到纽阿克,我和其他一些人...
translation.reference: 我被困在了费城，我本该搭乘美国航空公司的飞机前往纽瓦克的，当时夜已经很深，我和其他十几个人都想租车。

translation.en: The counter people were the worst I have ever seen.
translation.zh: 柜台工作人员是我见过的最差劲的工作人员。
translation.source: The counter people were the worst I have ever seen.
translation.medium: 对面的柜台人员是我见过的最差的
translation.reference: 柜台工作人员是我见过的最差劲的工作人员。

translation.en: A line out the door and they were taking breaks and talking about random non-work related stuff like we weren’t even here.
translation.zh: 门外排着队，他们却在休息，还聊着和工作无关的话题，就好像我们是空气一样。
translation.source: A line out the door and they were taking breaks and talking about random non-work related stuff like we weren’t even here.
translation.medium: 一直排到街上他们还在闲谈跟工作无关的事情好像我们根本不存在似的
translation.reference: 门外排着队，他们却在休息，还聊着和工作无关的话题，就好像我们是空气一样。

translation.en: I had a confirmed reservation went.
translation.zh: 但我已经预订了他们的车。
translation.source: I had a confirmed reservation went.
translation.medium: 我预定了房间
translation.reference: 但我已经预订了他们的车。

translation.en: After an hour of waiting, I told her what I had reserved and she loudly accused me of lying to her and told me off.
translation.zh: 所以，等了一个小时后，我跟柜台的人说我已预订车了，可她大声指责我胡说，叫我走开。
translation.source: After an hour of waiting, I told her what I had reserved and she loudly accused me of lying to her and told me off.
translation.medium: 在等了一个小时后，我告诉她我已经预定了什么，她大声的说我在骗她，并且训斥我。
translation.reference: 所以，等了一个小时后，我跟柜台的人说我已预订车了，可她大声指责我胡说，叫我走开。

translation.en: I finally gave up and walked over to Hertz, who charged me a fortune, but they got me a car right away.
translation.zh: 最后我放弃了，走到了 Hertz 那里，他们收了我一大笔钱，但马上给我安排了一辆车。
translation.source: I finally gave up and walked over to Hertz, who charged me a fortune, but they got me a car right away.
translation.medium: 我终于放弃,走到赫尔茨那里,他们收了我一大笔钱,但马上给我搞到了一辆车.
translation.reference: 最后我放弃了，走到了 Hertz 那里，他们收了我一大笔钱，但马上给我安排了一辆车。

translation.en: I swore to never use Avis again.
translation.zh: 我发誓再也不用 Avis 了。
translation.source: I swore to never use Avis again.
translation.medium: 我发誓再也不用阿维斯了
translation.reference: 我发誓再也不用 Avis 了。

translation.en: Worst car experience ever.
translation.zh: 这是我遇到的最糟糕的用车体验。
translation.source: Worst car experience ever.
translation.medium: 真是最糟的驾驶体验
translation.reference: 这是我遇到的最糟糕的用车体验。

translation.en: National & Hertz have always been good experiences for me.
translation.zh: National 和 Hertz 一直都很靠谱。
translation.source: National & Hertz have always been good experiences for me.
translation.medium: National和Hertz一直是我良好的经历。
translation.reference: National 和 Hertz 一直都很靠谱。

translation.en: Those two, followed by Enterprise.
translation.zh: 紧随其后的是 Enterprise。
translation.source: Those two, followed by Enterprise.
translation.medium: 后面是企业号
translation.reference: 紧随其后的是 Enterprise。

translation.en: Enterprise wasn’t really bad in any way but they were never as convenient as National where I could walk up and pick out a car and drive away without waiting forever at a counter.
translation.zh: 无论从哪方面来说，Enterprise 都不差，但总归没有 National 那么方便，在 National，永久不必在柜台前等候，随时都能找到一辆车开走。
translation.source: Enterprise wasn’t really bad in any way but they were never as convenient as National where I could walk up and pick out a car and drive away without waiting forever at a counter.
translation.medium: 企业不是真的坏在任何方式但他们永远不会像国家那样方便,我可以走过去和选择一辆车,
translation.reference: 无论从哪方面来说，Enterprise 都不差，但总归没有 National 那么方便，在 National，永久不必在柜台前等候，随时都能找到一辆车开走。

translation.en: I know these are anecdotal experiences but I’ll go out of my way to tell everyone to avoid Avis like the plague.
translation.zh: 我知道这些都是趣闻轶事，但我还是要告诉大家，要像躲避瘟疫一样避开 Avis。
translation.source: I know these are anecdotal experiences but I’ll go out of my way to tell everyone to avoid Avis like the plague.
translation.medium: 我知道这些都是偶然的经历 但我还是要去告诉大家 像瘟疫一样避开租车公司
translation.reference: 我知道这些都是趣闻轶事，但我还是要告诉大家，要像躲避瘟疫一样避开 Avis。

translation.en: It’s true that good customer service will keep customers loyal, and a bad customer experience will drive away 10 times as many more customer opportunities.
translation.zh: 要知道，优秀的客户服务才能拥有忠诚的客户，而糟糕的客户体验将流失 10 倍的客户。
translation.source: It’s true that good customer service will keep customers loyal, and a bad customer experience will drive away 10 times as many more customer opportunities.
translation.medium: 诚然，良好的顾客服务能使顾客忠诚，而糟糕的顾客体验会使10倍的更多的客户机会流失。
translation.reference: 要知道，优秀的客户服务才能拥有忠诚的客户，而糟糕的客户体验将流失 10 倍的客户。

translation.en: French fishermen threaten to disrupt British imports in post-Brexit fishing row
translation.zh: 在英国退欧后的渔业纠纷中，法国渔民威胁要中断从英国进口
translation.source: French fishermen threaten to disrupt British imports in post-Brexit fishing row
translation.medium: 法国渔民威胁在英国退出欧盟后中断英国的鱼类进口
translation.reference: 在英国退欧后的渔业纠纷中，法国渔民威胁要中断从英国进口

translation.en: French fishermen have threatened to disrupt British imports in an attempt to press London for more licenses as tensions escalate between France and the UK over post-Brexit fishing rights.
translation.zh: 法国渔民威胁中断从英国进口，以求向伦敦方面施压，要求其发放更多许可，目前英法两国围绕英国退欧后的捕鱼权问题的紧张局势不断升级。
translation.source: French fishermen have threatened to disrupt British imports in an attempt to press London for more licenses as tensions escalate between France and the UK over post-Brexit fishing rights.
translation.medium: 面对法国和英国之间在英国退出欧盟后的渔业权利上升的紧张关系，法国渔民威胁要破坏英国的进口。
translation.reference: 法国渔民威胁中断从英国进口，以求向伦敦方面施压，要求其发放更多许可，目前英法两国围绕英国退欧后的捕鱼权问题的紧张局势不断升级。

translation.en: The threat was made on Saturday a few hours after Britain agreed to issue another 23 licenses to French fishermen to alleviate tensions between the two neighbors who have been at loggerheads over the fishing row for the past six months.
translation.zh: 这一威胁是在周六发出的，就在几个小时前，英国同意向法国渔民另外发放 23 张捕鱼许可证，以缓解这两个邻国之间的紧张关系，过去 6 个月来，这两个国家一直因该捕鱼区而不和。
translation.source: The threat was made on Saturday a few hours after Britain agreed to issue another 23 licenses to French fishermen to alleviate tensions between the two neighbors who have been at loggerheads over the fishing row for the past six months.
translation.medium: 周六,英国同意向法国渔民颁发另外23份捕鱼许可证,以缓解两国之间的紧张关系。这两个邻居之间的渔业纠纷已经持续了半年。
translation.reference: 这一威胁是在周六发出的，就在几个小时前，英国同意向法国渔民另外发放 23 张捕鱼许可证，以缓解这两个邻国之间的紧张关系，过去 6 个月来，这两个国家一直因该捕鱼区而不和。

translation.en: France is seeking 81 more approvals to reach 104 licenses needed for its boats to operate in British and Channel Island waters under the Brexit agreement signed last year.
translation.zh: 根据去年签署的英国脱欧协议，法国正寻求再获得 81 张许可证，以达到其船只在英国和海峡群岛水域运营所需的 104 张许可证。
translation.source: France is seeking 81 more approvals to reach 104 licenses needed for its boats to operate in British and Channel Island waters under the Brexit agreement signed last year.
translation.medium: 法国需要再获得81项批准，才能达到根据去年签署的英国退出欧盟协议所需的104个许可证。
translation.reference: 根据去年签署的英国脱欧协议，法国正寻求再获得 81 张许可证，以达到其船只在英国和海峡群岛水域运营所需的 104 张许可证。

translation.en: The European Union had specified a December 10 deadline for London to grant licenses to French fishing boats under Brexit, with Paris threatening European legal action in case of no breakthrough.
translation.zh: 欧盟曾明确规定，在英国退欧期间，英国必须在 12 月 10 日之前向法国渔船发放许可证，法国威胁称，如果没有突破，欧洲将采取法律行动。
translation.source: The European Union had specified a December 10 deadline for London to grant licenses to French fishing boats under Brexit, with Paris threatening European legal action in case of no breakthrough.
translation.medium: 欧洲联盟规定12月10日为伦敦在英国退出欧盟后给予法国渔船许可的最后期限，而巴黎则威胁如果没有突破性进展就采取欧洲法律行动。
translation.reference: 欧盟曾明确规定，在英国退欧期间，英国必须在 12 月 10 日之前向法国渔船发放许可证，法国威胁称，如果没有突破，欧洲将采取法律行动。

translation.en: Underlining that France is entitled to around 80 more UK licenses, a group representing fishermen in the key port of Boulogne-sur-Mer and others along the northern coast threatened late on Saturday to launch protests.
translation.zh: 代表主要港口布洛涅 (Boulogne-sur-Mer) 和北部海岸其他地区渔民的一个组织上周六晚间威胁要发起抗议，指称法国还有资格获得约 80 个英国许可证。
translation.source: Underlining that France is entitled to around 80 more UK licenses, a group representing fishermen in the key port of Boulogne-sur-Mer and others along the northern coast threatened late on Saturday to launch protests.
translation.medium: 强调指出法国有权获得大约80个更多的英国许可，一个代表主要港口布鲁诺海峡的渔民的团体以及北海沿岸的其他人都在星期六晚些时候威胁发起抗议。
translation.reference: 代表主要港口布洛涅 (Boulogne-sur-Mer) 和北部海岸其他地区渔民的一个组织上周六晚间威胁要发起抗议，指称法国还有资格获得约 80 个英国许可证。

translation.en: "Protests should be expected ... protests that will target British imports," the local CRPMEM fishing industry group for the Hauts-de-France region said in a statement.
translation.zh: “抗议应该是预料之中的……抗议活动将针对英国进口产品，”法国上德地区当地渔业组织 CRPMEM 在一份声明中说。
translation.source: "Protests should be expected ... protests that will target British imports," the local CRPMEM fishing industry group for the Hauts-de-France region said in a statement.
translation.medium: 区渔业协会 CRPMEM 为法国北部地区发表声明表示，应该预计到抗议，这些抗议将以英国进口为目标。
translation.reference: “抗议应该是预料之中的……抗议活动将针对英国进口产品，”法国上德地区当地渔业组织 CRPMEM 在一份声明中说。

translation.en: The group said its members were "exasperated" by the news of only 23 new licenses and felt "betrayed" by the European Commission, which could launch legal action against Britain over the issue.
translation.zh: 该组织表示，其成员对只有 23 个新牌照的消息感到“愤怒”，觉得被欧盟委员会“背叛”了，欧盟委员会可能会就此问题对英国采取法律行动。
translation.source: The group said its members were "exasperated" by the news of only 23 new licenses and felt "betrayed" by the European Commission, which could launch legal action against Britain over the issue.
translation.medium: 该组织称，其成员对仅发放23份新牌照的消息感到"烦恼"，并感到欧洲委员会"背叛"了他们，因为该委员会可以针对英国就此问题提起法律诉讼。
translation.reference: 该组织表示，其成员对只有 23 个新牌照的消息感到“愤怒”，觉得被欧盟委员会“背叛”了，欧盟委员会可能会就此问题对英国采取法律行动。

translation.en: The CRPMEM said the protests would be "in line with blockades of ports in Brittany, Normandy and the north of France which took place on November 26."
translation.zh: CRPMEM 表示，抗议活动将“与 11 月 26 日发生的对布列塔尼、诺曼底和法国北部港口的封锁一致”。
translation.source: The CRPMEM said the protests would be "in line with blockades of ports in Brittany, Normandy and the north of France which took place on November 26."
translation.medium: 中国日报网11月27日电近日，法国中部和南部地区发生了一系列罢工。
translation.reference: CRPMEM 表示，抗议活动将“与 11 月 26 日发生的对布列塔尼、诺曼底和法国北部港口的封锁一致”。

translation.en: On that day, French fishing boats briefly blocked ferries and other boats in the ports of Calais, Saint-Malo and Ouistreham, while vehicles were also sent to disrupt traffic seeking to use the Channel Tunnel rail link.
translation.zh: 当天，法国渔船在加莱、圣马洛和乌斯特雷姆港口短暂拦截了渡轮和其他船只，同时还派车辆扰乱试图通过英吉利海峡隧道铁路的交通。
translation.source: On that day, French fishing boats briefly blocked ferries and other boats in the ports of Calais, Saint-Malo and Ouistreham, while vehicles were also sent to disrupt traffic seeking to use the Channel Tunnel rail link.
translation.medium: 当天，法国渔船在卡莱斯、圣马洛和奥斯特兰海港短暂封锁了渡轮和其他船只，同时还派出车辆阻碍使用英吉利海峡隧道的交通。
translation.reference: 当天，法国渔船在加莱、圣马洛和乌斯特雷姆港口短暂拦截了渡轮和其他船只，同时还派车辆扰乱试图通过英吉利海峡隧道铁路的交通。

translation.en: Several rounds of talks between the two sides have since been held but a durable solution has yet to be worked out.
translation.zh: 此后双方进行了几轮会谈，但尚未制定出持久的解决方案。
translation.source: Several rounds of talks between the two sides have since been held but a durable solution has yet to be worked out.
translation.medium: 此后，双方举行了几轮会谈，但尚未达成持久解决方案。
translation.reference: 此后双方进行了几轮会谈，但尚未制定出持久的解决方案。

translation.en: Therefore, we are prepared to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have before placing an order or after you have received your order.
translation.zh: 因此，如果您在下单前或收到商品后遇到问题，
translation.source: Therefore, we are prepared to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have before placing an order or after you have received your order.
translation.medium: 所以，我们准备好协助您解决您在订购前或订购后可能出现的任何问题。
translation.reference: 因此，如果您在下单前或收到商品后遇到问题，

translation.en: Please kindly contact us via eBay messages and a member of our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
translation.zh: 请通过 eBay 消息联系我们，我们将尽快给您答复。
translation.source: Please kindly contact us via eBay messages and a member of our team will get back to you as soon as possible.
translation.medium: 如果您还有任何问题，请联系我们。
translation.reference: 请通过 eBay 消息联系我们，我们将尽快给您答复。

translation.en: Please note: Our office opening times are: Monday-Friday from 09:00 - 17:30.
translation.zh: 请注意：我们的办公时间为：周一到周五，09:00 - 17:30。
translation.source: Please note: Our office opening times are: Monday-Friday from 09:00 - 17:30.
translation.medium: 请注意:我们的办公时间是:周一至周五09:00-17:30。
translation.reference: 请注意：我们的办公时间为：周一到周五，09:00 - 17:30。

translation.en: The office remains closed on the weekend.
translation.zh: 周末不办公。
translation.source: The office remains closed on the weekend.
translation.medium: 办公室星期末仍然关门。
translation.reference: 周末不办公。

translation.en: On the days the office is closed, we will not be able dispatch your orders.
translation.zh: 非办公时间不发货。
translation.source: On the days the office is closed, we will not be able dispatch your orders.
translation.medium: 在办公室休息的日子里，我们将无法递交您的订单。
translation.reference: 非办公时间不发货。

translation.en: Also all orders placed on the weekends will be dispatched within the next working days.
translation.zh: 此外，所有周末订单将在下一个工作日天内发出。
translation.source: Also all orders placed on the weekends will be dispatched within the next working days.
translation.medium: 周末订单也会在下个工作日内配送。
translation.reference: 此外，所有周末订单将在下一个工作日天内发出。

translation.en: Our aim is to offer our customers the best service possible.
translation.zh: 我们的目标是为客户提供最好的服务。
translation.source: Our aim is to offer our customers the best service possible.
translation.medium: 我们的宗旨是为客户提供尽可能最好的服务。
translation.reference: 我们的目标是为客户提供最好的服务。

translation.en: That is why we dispatch our orders within 1 working day once the payment has cleared.
translation.zh: 因此，我们会在客户付款后的 1 个工作日内发出订单。
translation.source: That is why we dispatch our orders within 1 working day once the payment has cleared.
translation.medium: 这就是我们为什么会在收到付款后的1个工作日内发出订单。
translation.reference: 因此，我们会在客户付款后的 1 个工作日内发出订单。

translation.en: The delivery services we offer is standard tracked post (2-3 working days), first class service, as well as an express service.
translation.zh: 我们提供的送货服务是 Standard Tracked Post（2-3 个工作日）、First Class Service 和 Express Service。
translation.source: The delivery services we offer is standard tracked post (2-3 working days), first class service, as well as an express service.
translation.medium: 我们提供的配送服务包括标准的跟踪邮件服务(2-3个工作日),第一类服务,以及快递服务。
translation.reference: 我们提供的送货服务是 Standard Tracked Post（2-3 个工作日）、First Class Service 和 Express Service。

translation.en: Please note, there may be slight delays from the courier service during festive occasions (e.g. Christmas).
translation.zh: 请注意，在节日期间（如圣诞节），快递服务可能会稍有延迟。
translation.source: Please note, there may be slight delays from the courier service during festive occasions (e.g. Christmas).
translation.medium: 请注意,节日期间(例如圣诞节)邮递服务可能略有延迟。
translation.reference: 请注意，在节日期间（如圣诞节），快递服务可能会稍有延迟。

translation.en: Returns must be within 30 days of delivery in the exact same condition as they were sent.
translation.zh: 收货后 30 天内可退货，前提是商品状况与发货时完全相同。
translation.source: Returns must be within 30 days of delivery in the exact same condition as they were sent.
translation.medium: 顾客须在货到之日起30天内退回商品。退回的商品必须完好无损。
translation.reference: 收货后 30 天内可退货，前提是商品状况与发货时完全相同。

translation.en: Please kindly message us via eBay messages regarding your return.
translation.zh: 如需退货，请通过 eBay 消息联系我们。
translation.source: Please kindly message us via eBay messages regarding your return.
translation.medium: 如果您还有任何问题，请联系我们。
translation.reference: 如需退货，请通过 eBay 消息联系我们。

translation.en: Please include your eBay user name and a reason for return on a note to the parcel to speed up your refund or exchange process.
translation.zh: 请在包裹中放入一张纸条，写上您的 eBay 用户名和退货原因，以加快退款或换货过程。
translation.source: Please include your eBay user name and a reason for return on a note to the parcel to speed up your refund or exchange process.
translation.medium: 请在包裹上标注您的ebay用户名和退换原因，以加快您的退款或换货过程。
translation.reference: 请在包裹中放入一张纸条，写上您的 eBay 用户名和退货原因，以加快退款或换货过程。

translation.en: We will refund delivery costs if the goods are faulty, but for all other returns, this will not apply.
translation.zh: 如果商品有问题，我们将退还运费；出于其他原因的退货则不退还运费。
translation.source: We will refund delivery costs if the goods are faulty, but for all other returns, this will not apply.
translation.medium: 如果收到的货品有质量问题，我们会退还配送费用，但是所有其他的退货不在退费范围内。
translation.reference: 如果商品有问题，我们将退还运费；出于其他原因的退货则不退还运费。

translation.en: This stuff withers when exposed to any critical thought.
translation.zh: 如果以批判性思维来看，这些东西会不攻自破。
translation.source: This stuff withers when exposed to any critical thought.
translation.medium: 这种观点一遇到批判就会堕落
translation.reference: 如果以批判性思维来看，这些东西会不攻自破。

translation.en: I'm not going to rule out that there are vast swaths of people who don't practice critical thinking, but either way, proving it wrong is no guarantee that it will wither.
translation.zh: 我不排除有很多人根本没有建立批判性思维，但无论如何，证明它是错误的并不能保证它就会消失。
translation.source: I'm not going to rule out that there are vast swaths of people who don't practice critical thinking, but either way, proving it wrong is no guarantee that it will wither.
translation.medium: 我不会排除有大量的人不会进行批判性思考的可能性,但不管怎样,证明它错误的事实并不能保证它会萎缩.
translation.reference: 我不排除有很多人根本没有建立批判性思维，但无论如何，证明它是错误的并不能保证它就会消失。

translation.en: After all, we've already had a forensic audit and a hand recount of these votes, and that didn't help.
translation.zh: 毕竟，我们已经进行了司法审计和手工重新计票，但并无作用。
translation.source: After all, we've already had a forensic audit and a hand recount of these votes, and that didn't help.
translation.medium: 毕竟我们已经对这些票进行了法医审查和人工点票,
translation.reference: 毕竟，我们已经进行了司法审计和手工重新计票，但并无作用。

translation.en: Should we just keep allowing them to "audit" votes until they get the results they want?
translation.zh: 我们应该继续允许他们“审计”投票，直到他们得到他们想要的结果吗？
translation.source: Should we just keep allowing them to "audit" votes until they get the results they want?
translation.medium: 我们应该继续允许他们"审计"选票,直到他们得到想要的结果吗?
translation.reference: 我们应该继续允许他们“审计”投票，直到他们得到他们想要的结果吗？

translation.en: >This is letting Uri Geller try and pull his shit on James Randi.
translation.zh: >这样就是让尤里·盖勒 (Uri Geller) 对詹姆斯·兰迪 (James Randi) 下手。
translation.source: >This is letting Uri Geller try and pull his shit on James Randi.
translation.medium: 这就是让乌利·杰克勒尝试在詹姆斯·兰迪脸上拉屎
translation.reference: >这样就是让尤里·盖勒 (Uri Geller) 对詹姆斯·兰迪 (James Randi) 下手。

translation.en: This is where the story ends and the lie goes to die.
translation.zh: 故事会就此结束，谎言会就此终结吗？
translation.source: This is where the story ends and the lie goes to die.
translation.medium: 这就是故事的结局 和谎言去死。
translation.reference: 故事会就此结束，谎言会就此终结吗？

translation.en: No, it's not.
translation.zh: 不，不会的。
translation.source: No, it's not.
translation.medium: 不,不是
translation.reference: 不，不会的。

translation.en: This is Uri Geller trying to pull his shit on James Randi, not liking the results, and hiring a company whose CEO has claimed he believes Geller's powers are real to "study" his powers and investigate whether Randi is a Communist who's trying to ruin Geller.
translation.zh: 尤里·盖勒想对詹姆斯·兰迪下手，他不喜欢这样的结果，并雇佣了一家公司，该公司的首席执行官声称，他相信盖勒的能力是真实的，他们要“研究”他的能力和并调查兰迪是否是一个试图毁掉盖勒的共产主义者。
translation.source: This is Uri Geller trying to pull his shit on James Randi, not liking the results, and hiring a company whose CEO has claimed he believes Geller's powers are real to "study" his powers and investigate whether Randi is a Communist who's trying to ruin Geller.
translation.medium: 这是Uri Geller想通过欺骗James Randi,不满意结果,
translation.reference: 尤里·盖勒想对詹姆斯·兰迪下手，他不喜欢这样的结果，并雇佣了一家公司，该公司的首席执行官声称，他相信盖勒的能力是真实的，他们要“研究”他的能力和并调查兰迪是否是一个试图毁掉盖勒的共产主义者。

translation.en: If there are no results produced here, they'll ask for another audit.
translation.zh: 如果没有结果，他们会要求再次审核。
translation.source: If there are no results produced here, they'll ask for another audit.
translation.medium: 如果这里没有成果,他们会要求再做一次审计.
translation.reference: 如果没有结果，他们会要求再次审核。

translation.en: Or they'll claim that shredded ballots were fed to chickens that were then incinerated.
translation.zh: 或者他们会说撕碎的选票已经烧成灰给鸡吃了。
translation.source: Or they'll claim that shredded ballots were fed to chickens that were then incinerated.
translation.medium: 否则他们会声称被撕毁的选票被喂鸡吃了然后这些鸡被烧死了
translation.reference: 或者他们会说撕碎的选票已经烧成灰给鸡吃了。

translation.en: >At some point, you have to do the actual work of looking at reality and comparing it to what they think and point out where they are wrong.
translation.zh: >在某种程度上，你得做些实际的工作，揭露现实，将其与他们的想法进行比较，并指出他们的错误。
translation.source: >At some point, you have to do the actual work of looking at reality and comparing it to what they think and point out where they are wrong.
translation.medium: 在某个点,你必须做实际工作,看现实,并将它与他们的想法比较,指出他们错误的地方.
translation.reference: >在某种程度上，你得做些实际的工作，揭露现实，将其与他们的想法进行比较，并指出他们的错误。

translation.en: We've already done this.
translation.zh: 我们已经做过了。
translation.source: We've already done this.
translation.medium: 我们已经做过了
translation.reference: 我们已经做过了。

translation.en: Twice.
translation.zh: 而且是两次。
translation.source: Twice.
translation.medium: 两次
translation.reference: 而且是两次。

translation.en: It hasn't stopped them.
translation.zh: 但这并没有让他们停下来。
translation.source: It hasn't stopped them.
translation.medium: 但这并不妨碍他们
translation.reference: 但这并没有让他们停下来。

translation.en: And it's not like this is harmless.
translation.zh: 何况，这样并非没有坏处。
translation.source: And it's not like this is harmless.
translation.medium: 而且这可不是无害的
translation.reference: 何况，这样并非没有坏处。

translation.en: There are already allegations that these people are breaking federal law by not properly securing ballots.
translation.zh: 已经有人指控，这些人没有妥善保管选票，违反了联邦法律。
translation.source: There are already allegations that these people are breaking federal law by not properly securing ballots.
translation.medium: 有指控称他们违反了联邦法律 因为他们没有妥善地保管选票
translation.reference: 已经有人指控，这些人没有妥善保管选票，违反了联邦法律。

translation.en: Also mentioned in that article: This company plans to physically canvas parts of Maricopa county to ask people if their ballots match.
translation.zh: 该文章还提到：该公司计划在马里科帕县的部分地区进行实地调查，询问人们选票是否匹配。
translation.source: Also mentioned in that article: This company plans to physically canvas parts of Maricopa county to ask people if their ballots match.
translation.medium: 也提到在那篇文章:这家公司计划实际勘查玛里科帕郡的一部分,问人们他们的选票匹配。
translation.reference: 该文章还提到：该公司计划在马里科帕县的部分地区进行实地调查，询问人们选票是否匹配。

translation.en: How comfortable would *you* be if someone showed up to ask you who you voted for in the last election, knowing that if you don't tell them, your vote might be flagged and discarded?
translation.zh: 如果有人来问你在上次选举中投了谁的票，而且知道如果你不说，你的票可能会被做上标记和丢弃，你心里舒服吗？
translation.source: How comfortable would *you* be if someone showed up to ask you who you voted for in the last election, knowing that if you don't tell them, your vote might be flagged and discarded?
translation.medium: 如果有人来问你上次选举你投票给谁 知道如果你不告诉他们,你的选票有可能被剔除吗?
translation.reference: 如果有人来问你在上次选举中投了谁的票，而且知道如果你不说，你的票可能会被做上标记和丢弃，你心里舒服吗？

translation.en: How sure are you that this company is going to keep that data private, and not let others in your community know?
translation.zh: 对这家公司是否会对这些数据采取保密措施，不让你所在社区的其他人知道，你有多大的把握？
translation.source: How sure are you that this company is going to keep that data private, and not let others in your community know?
translation.medium: 你有多确定这家公司能保证数据安全不会被别人知道?
translation.reference: 对这家公司是否会对这些数据采取保密措施，不让你所在社区的其他人知道，你有多大的把握？

translation.en: And would you be as likely to vote if you knew that was a possibility every time?
translation.zh: 如果你知道每次都有这种可能性，你还会投票吗？
translation.source: And would you be as likely to vote if you knew that was a possibility every time?
translation.medium: 如果你知道这是每次都有可能会投票吗
translation.reference: 如果你知道每次都有这种可能性，你还会投票吗？

translation.en: I know plenty of people who wouldn't.
translation.zh: 我知道很多人不会了。
translation.source: I know plenty of people who wouldn't.
translation.medium: 我知道有很多人不会的
translation.reference: 我知道很多人不会了。

translation.en: Is a regular feature that the device has, if you want to save more energy you can process this steps:
translation.zh: 这是该设备的一个常规功能，如果您想省电，可以执行以下步骤：
translation.source: Is a regular feature that the device has, if you want to save more energy you can process this steps:
translation.medium: 是一个经常的特征，如果你想要保存更多的能源你可以实施这些步骤:
translation.reference: 这是该设备的一个常规功能，如果您想省电，可以执行以下步骤：

translation.en: Go to your Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。
translation.source: Go to your Home screen.
translation.medium: 到您的主屏幕。
translation.reference: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap the  More icon at the bottom of the screen.
translation.zh: 点击屏幕底部的“更多”图标。
translation.source: Tap the  More icon at the bottom of the screen.
translation.medium: 在屏幕的底部单击更多的图标。
translation.reference: 点击屏幕底部的“更多”图标。

translation.en: Tap Settings.
translation.zh: 点击“设置”。
translation.source: Tap Settings.
translation.medium: 查找设定。
translation.reference: 点击“设置”。

translation.en: Tap Energy saving and privacy.
translation.zh: 点击“省电和隐私”。
translation.source: Tap Energy saving and privacy.
translation.medium: 节能和隐私权保护。
translation.reference: 点击“省电和隐私”。

translation.en: Tap the list beside ‘Automatically go to sleep after’ and select the time before your #PRS_ORG# eReader goes to sleep.
translation.zh: 点击“以下时间后自动进入睡眠：”旁边的列表，并选择 #PRS_ORG# 电子阅读器多长时间后进入睡眠。
translation.source: Tap the list beside ‘Automatically go to sleep after’ and select the time before your #PRS_ORG# eReader goes to sleep.
translation.medium: 在“自动睡眠后”列表旁的列表中选择睡眠前的时间。
translation.reference: 点击“以下时间后自动进入睡眠：”旁边的列表，并选择 #PRS_ORG# 电子阅读器多长时间后进入睡眠。

translation.en: The shorter the time, the longer your eReader's battery will last.
translation.zh: 这个时间越短，电子阅读器的电池续航时间就越长。
translation.source: The shorter the time, the longer your eReader's battery will last.
translation.medium: 时间越短，读书机的电池续航时间就越长。
translation.reference: 这个时间越短，电子阅读器的电池续航时间就越长。

translation.en: Tap the list beside ‘Automatically power off after’ and select the time before your #PRS_ORG# eReader shuts down.
translation.zh: 点击“以下时间后自动关机：”旁边的列表，并选择 #PRS_ORG# 电子阅读器多长时间后关机。
translation.source: Tap the list beside ‘Automatically power off after’ and select the time before your #PRS_ORG# eReader shuts down.
translation.medium: 在"自动关机前等待时间"的列表中选择要求的时间。
translation.reference: 点击“以下时间后自动关机：”旁边的列表，并选择 #PRS_ORG# 电子阅读器多长时间后关机。

translation.en: The shorter the time, the longer your eReader's battery will last.
translation.zh: 这个时间越短，电子阅读器的电池续航时间就越长。
translation.source: The shorter the time, the longer your eReader's battery will last.
translation.medium: 时间越短，读书机的电池续航时间就越长。
translation.reference: 这个时间越短，电子阅读器的电池续航时间就越长。

translation.en: Thank you for the information.
translation.zh: 感谢您提供的信息。
translation.source: Thank you for the information.
translation.medium: 感谢你提供的情报
translation.reference: 感谢您提供的信息。

translation.en: I will be more than happy to assist you.
translation.zh: 我很高兴能帮到您。
translation.source: I will be more than happy to assist you.
translation.medium: 我乐于助你
translation.reference: 我很高兴能帮到您。

translation.en: I'll review your account, one moment, please.
translation.zh: 我需要检查您的帐户，请稍候。
translation.source: I'll review your account, one moment, please.
translation.medium: 我会处理你的帐单一会儿就好
translation.reference: 我需要检查您的帐户，请稍候。

translation.en: Thank you for your waiting time, I have checked the information into your account.
translation.zh: 谢谢您的等待，我已经查询到您的帐户信息了。
translation.source: Thank you for your waiting time, I have checked the information into your account.
translation.medium: 谢谢您一直以来的耐心，我已经把资料转到您的帐户了。
translation.reference: 谢谢您的等待，我已经查询到您的帐户信息了。

translation.en: I'm really sorry to know that you are having this issue with your eBook , however, I'm willing to help you.
translation.zh: 对于您遇到的电子书问题，我觉得很抱歉，也希望能帮助到您。
translation.source: I'm really sorry to know that you are having this issue with your eBook , however, I'm willing to help you.
translation.medium: 很抱歉获悉您在使用您的电子书时遇到了这个问题，但我愿意帮助您。
translation.reference: 对于您遇到的电子书问题，我觉得很抱歉，也希望能帮助到您。

translation.en: I'll share a couple of steps to perform into your eReader, okay?
translation.zh: 我将与您分享一些可在电子阅读器上执行的步骤。
translation.source: I'll share a couple of steps to perform into your eReader, okay?
translation.medium: 我会告诉你一些步骤.
translation.reference: 我将与您分享一些可在电子阅读器上执行的步骤。

translation.en: and ydo your first purchase from the #PRS_ORG# website
translation.zh: 首次从 #PRS_ORG# 网站购买

translation.medium: 并且要做的第一笔购买从网站#PRS_ORG #

translation.en: To update your payment information please follow these steps:

translation.source: To update your payment information please follow these steps:
translation.medium: 更新您的付款信息请遵循以下步骤：
translation.reference: 要更新付款信息，请执行以下步骤：

translation.zh: 登录您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户。

translation.reference: 登录您的 #PRS_ORG# 帐户。

translation.source: Click on "My Account" and in the menu select "Account Settings”

translation.reference: 单击“我的帐户”，并在菜单中选择“帐户设置”

translation.source: Select the “Payment Information” tab.
translation.medium: 选择“付款信息”标签。
translation.reference: 选择“付款信息”选项卡。

translation.en: Under “Payment Information”, select the type of credit card and enter your card number, security code (CVV), name on the card, and expiration date.
translation.zh: 在“付款信息”下，选择信用卡类型并输入卡上的卡号、安全码 (CVV) 和过期日期。
translation.source: Under “Payment Information”, select the type of credit card and enter your card number, security code (CVV), name on the card, and expiration date.
translation.medium: 在“付款信息”部分，请选择您所使用的信用卡类型，并输入您的信用卡号码、安全代码、卡面姓名以及信用卡有效期。
translation.reference: 在“付款信息”下，选择信用卡类型并输入卡上的卡号、安全码 (CVV) 和过期日期。
