translation.source: Director Boyd Douglas-Davies, who is also president of the Horticulture Trades Association, said: "People are trading up from a plant in the bedroom and putting in beautifully decorated trees."
translation.medium: 园艺行业协会主席兼理事长BoydDouglas-Davies指出："人们正在把床头柜上的植物换成装扮漂亮的圣诞树。"
translation.reference: 博伊德·道格拉斯-戴维斯是园艺业协会的主席，他说：“人们热衷于把卧室里的植物换成装饰漂亮的树。”

translation.en: Fellow garden centre chain Squire's reports that 30 per cent of their customers plan on having at least two trees - and more than one in ten intend to have three or more.
translation.zh: 另一家园艺中心连锁店 Squire 的报告称，30% 的客户计划至少购买两棵树，超过十分之一的客户打算购买三棵或更多。
translation.source: Fellow garden centre chain Squire's reports that 30 per cent of their customers plan on having at least two trees - and more than one in ten intend to have three or more.
translation.medium: 花园中心连锁店Squire's报告称其30%的客户计划至少购买两棵树，10%以上的客户打算购买三棵以上。
translation.reference: 另一家园艺中心连锁店 Squire 的报告称，30% 的客户计划至少购买两棵树，超过十分之一的客户打算购买三棵或更多。

translation.en: Chairman Sarah Squire said: "They give a bedroom a lovely, calming scent that is the perfect aid for a good night's sleep."
translation.zh: 主席莎拉·斯夸尔说：“它们给卧室带来一种好闻的、镇静的气味，能让人晚上睡一个好觉。”
translation.source: Chairman Sarah Squire said: "They give a bedroom a lovely, calming scent that is the perfect aid for a good night's sleep."
translation.medium: 联合王国床垫协会主席SarahSquire表示："它们能给卧室带来柔和的香味，有益于睡眠。"
translation.reference: 主席莎拉·斯夸尔说：“它们给卧室带来一种好闻的、镇静的气味，能让人晚上睡一个好觉。”

translation.en: Just as bedroom plants have been known to help mental health and purify the air, trees are also said to aid slumber.
translation.zh: 众所周知，卧室里的植物有助于心理健康和净化空气，树木据说也有助于睡眠。
translation.source: Just as bedroom plants have been known to help mental health and purify the air, trees are also said to aid slumber.
translation.medium: 类似于床房植物已经知道帮助心理健康和净化空气,树木也说会帮助入睡.
translation.reference: 众所周知，卧室里的植物有助于心理健康和净化空气，树木据说也有助于睡眠。

translation.en: Sleep expert Carl Walsh said: "Our brains collect information from our surroundings and this translates into signals releasing hormones in response.
translation.zh: 睡眠专家卡尔·沃尔什说：“我们的大脑从周围环境收集信息，然后转化为信号，释放激素。
translation.source: Sleep expert Carl Walsh said: "Our brains collect information from our surroundings and this translates into signals releasing hormones in response.
translation.medium: 睡眠专家卡尔·沃尔什说："我们的大脑从我们的周围环境收集信息，这转化为信号，释放荷尔蒙作为回应。
translation.reference: 睡眠专家卡尔·沃尔什说：“我们的大脑从周围环境收集信息，然后转化为信号，释放激素。

translation.en: In this instance melatonin and cortisol are the hormones that control your sleep cycle and put your body into a sleepy state."
translation.zh: 在这种情况下，控制睡眠周期的褪黑激素和皮质醇可让你的身体进入昏昏欲睡的状态。”
translation.source: In this instance melatonin and cortisol are the hormones that control your sleep cycle and put your body into a sleepy state."
translation.medium: 在这种情况下,雌荷尔蒙和荷尔蒙控制你的睡眠周期,并把你的身体进入一个睡意。"
translation.reference: 在这种情况下，控制睡眠周期的褪黑激素和皮质醇可让你的身体进入昏昏欲睡的状态。”

translation.en: He added that a bedroom tree could also transport people back to a more carefree and youthful era.
translation.zh: 他补充说，卧室里的圣诞树还可以让人们回到更无忧无虑、更年轻的时代。
translation.source: He added that a bedroom tree could also transport people back to a more carefree and youthful era.
translation.medium: 他补充道，书房树人们还可以回到一个无忧无虑和青春的时代。
translation.reference: 他补充说，卧室里的圣诞树还可以让人们回到更无忧无虑、更年轻的时代。

translation.en: "Christmas can be a pretty stressful time.
translation.zh: “圣诞节可能是一个压力很大的时候。
translation.source: "Christmas can be a pretty stressful time.
translation.medium: 圣诞节可能会是比较紧张的时间。
translation.reference: “圣诞节可能是一个压力很大的时候。

translation.en: A bedroom tree takes people back to their childhood when they had no responsibilities and can forget about stressful things.
translation.zh: 卧室里的圣诞树可以让人们忘记压力，回到没有负担的童年时代。
translation.source: A bedroom tree takes people back to their childhood when they had no responsibilities and can forget about stressful things.
translation.medium: 卧室树把人们带回了他们的童年，当他们没有责任，并可以忘记关于压力的事情。
translation.reference: 卧室里的圣诞树可以让人们忘记压力，回到没有负担的童年时代。

translation.en: That is always good for sleep."
translation.zh: 这对睡眠总是有好处的。”
translation.source: That is always good for sleep."
translation.medium: 这对睡眠总是有好处的。"
translation.reference: 这对睡眠总是有好处的。”

translation.en: I am afraid I would not be able to confirm the price of the bed until it is available on the website again as it was reduced in our winter sale it is likely this will not be the price of the article when it is added back to the website
translation.zh: 现在我可能没法确定床的价格，恐怕要到网站上显示有货的时候才能知道，不过，之前是冬季促销，补货后可能就不是这个价格了
translation.source: I am afraid I would not be able to confirm the price of the bed until it is available on the website again as it was reduced in our winter sale it is likely this will not be the price of the article when it is added back to the website
translation.medium: 我恐怕我无法确认床的价格直到它在网站上再次可用因为它已经减少在我们的冬季销售这很可能这将不是文章的价格当它再次添加到网站
translation.reference: 现在我可能没法确定床的价格，恐怕要到网站上显示有货的时候才能知道，不过，之前是冬季促销，补货后可能就不是这个价格了

translation.en: Sorry for the inconveniences
translation.zh: 给您带来不便，非常抱歉
translation.source: Sorry for the inconveniences
translation.medium: 抱歉为您带来了不便
translation.reference: 给您带来不便，非常抱歉

translation.en: Is there anything else I can assist you with?
translation.zh: 还有什么可以帮您的吗？
translation.source: Is there anything else I can assist you with?
translation.medium: 还有什么事吗?
translation.reference: 还有什么可以帮您的吗？

translation.en: This is the first time and I hope the last.
translation.zh: 这是第一次，希望也是最后一次。
translation.source: This is the first time and I hope the last.
translation.medium: 这是第一次也是最后一次
translation.reference: 这是第一次，希望也是最后一次。

translation.en: Have a wonderful rest of your day and happy new year!
translation.zh: 祝您新年快乐，顺顺利利！
translation.source: Have a wonderful rest of your day and happy new year!
translation.medium: 祝你愉快度过剩下的一天,也祝你新年快乐!
translation.reference: 祝您新年快乐，顺顺利利！

translation.en: Makeshift Munster crush Wasps in Champions Cup cracker
translation.zh: 临时组织的芒斯特在冠军杯比赛中击败黄蜂队
translation.source: Makeshift Munster crush Wasps in Champions Cup cracker
translation.medium: 临时组成的蒙斯特队在冠军杯比赛中击败了Wasps队.
translation.reference: 临时组织的芒斯特在冠军杯比赛中击败黄蜂队

translation.en: Munster overran Wasps in a thrillingly chaotic Heineken Champions Cup clash contested by makeshift teams besieged by Covid and injury problems.
translation.zh: 在喜力冠军杯比赛中，芒斯特在混乱中令人激动地击败了黄蜂队，被新冠病毒和伤病困扰的临时球队参加了比赛。
translation.source: Munster overran Wasps in a thrillingly chaotic Heineken Champions Cup clash contested by makeshift teams besieged by Covid and injury problems.
translation.medium: 慕尼斯特队在一场令人兴奋的混乱不堪的海因肯杯比赛中战胜了华斯队
translation.reference: 在喜力冠军杯比赛中，芒斯特在混乱中令人激动地击败了黄蜂队，被新冠病毒和伤病困扰的临时球队参加了比赛。

translation.en: A rollercoaster first half ended with Munster leading 13-7 after Wasps skipper Brad Shields had been controversially sent off for a dangerous tackle on Dave Kilcoyne.
translation.zh: 在黄蜂队队长布拉德·希尔兹因对戴夫·基尔科因的危险铲断而被有争议地罚下后，过山车般的上半场以芒斯特 13-7 领先结束。
translation.source: A rollercoaster first half ended with Munster leading 13-7 after Wasps skipper Brad Shields had been controversially sent off for a dangerous tackle on Dave Kilcoyne.
translation.medium: 一场精彩刺激的半场比赛后蒙特尔以13比7领先沃斯,半场比赛结束后沃斯队长布雷德·席尔德因为对戴夫·基尔科恩的一次危险的铲球被红牌警告。
translation.reference: 在黄蜂队队长布拉德·希尔兹因对戴夫·基尔科因的危险铲断而被有争议地罚下后，过山车般的上半场以芒斯特 13-7 领先结束。

translation.en: And with hooker Dan Frost sin-binned on the stroke of half-time, their 13 men were on the ropes and Munster reacted by engineering tries for debutant Patrick Campbell and Andrew Conway.
translation.zh: 随着前场中锋丹·弗罗斯特在中场休息时被罚下，他们的 13 名队员被逼到了绝境，芒斯特的反应是尝试让新人帕特里克·坎贝尔和安德鲁·康威上场。
translation.source: And with hooker Dan Frost sin-binned on the stroke of half-time, their 13 men were on the ropes and Munster reacted by engineering tries for debutant Patrick Campbell and Andrew Conway.
translation.medium: 在半场结束前的最后时刻，他们的第13号丹·弗罗斯因为犯规进了禁区，他们处于被动，而慕尼黑队借此机会为初次亮相的派翠克·坎伯和安德鲁·康威制造了进球。
translation.reference: 随着前场中锋丹·弗罗斯特在中场休息时被罚下，他们的 13 名队员被逼到了绝境，芒斯特的反应是尝试让新人帕特里克·坎贝尔和安德鲁·康威上场。

translation.en: Alfie Barbeary's all-action display capped by a captivating try had given Wasps hope but he was unexpectedly replaced at half-time and it became one-way traffic from the moment Campbell showed his class to finish in the 43rd minute.
translation.zh: 阿尔菲·巴伯利充满斗志的表现以及充满魅力的尝试给了黄蜂队希望，但他在中场休息时被意外替换，从坎贝尔表现的那一刻到第 43 分钟结束比赛，比赛就变成了一方的表演。
translation.source: Alfie Barbeary's all-action display capped by a captivating try had given Wasps hope but he was unexpectedly replaced at half-time and it became one-way traffic from the moment Campbell showed his class to finish in the 43rd minute.
translation.medium: 阿尔菲·芭贝里的全速表演，最后一次精彩的进球给了瓦斯普希望，但半场结束时他被意想不到的换下，那么比赛也一发不可收拾，卡尔·坎普尔的进球在第43分钟结束了比赛。
translation.reference: 阿尔菲·巴伯利充满斗志的表现以及充满魅力的尝试给了黄蜂队希望，但他在中场休息时被意外替换，从坎贝尔表现的那一刻到第 43 分钟结束比赛，比赛就变成了一方的表演。

translation.en: Missing 17 players to injury, Wasps also had to contend with the loss of four more to Covid in the morning, resulting in a hasty reconfiguration of the team.
translation.zh: 黄蜂队 17 名队员因伤缺阵，当天上午又有 4 名队员感染了新冠，球队被迫匆忙进行重新组织。
translation.source: Missing 17 players to injury, Wasps also had to contend with the loss of four more to Covid in the morning, resulting in a hasty reconfiguration of the team.
translation.medium: 17名球员因为受伤而缺阵,另外还有4名球员在早上因为感染新型冠状病毒而缺阵,这导致了队伍的临时重组。
translation.reference: 黄蜂队 17 名队员因伤缺阵，当天上午又有 4 名队员感染了新冠，球队被迫匆忙进行重新组织。

translation.en: Munster, meanwhile, were missing 34 squad personnel because of quarantine following their recent ill-fated United Rugby Championship trip to South Africa, creating five debutants in the starting XV and another seven on the bench.
translation.zh: 与此同时，芒斯特队在最近命运多舛的南非联合橄榄球锦标赛之旅后，由于隔离而致使 34 名队员缺阵，这使得首发的 15 人中有 5 名队员初次登场，另有 7 名替补队员。
translation.source: Munster, meanwhile, were missing 34 squad personnel because of quarantine following their recent ill-fated United Rugby Championship trip to South Africa, creating five debutants in the starting XV and another seven on the bench.
translation.medium: 慕内斯特同时因为最近一次不幸的参加联合国橄榄球冠军联赛的南非之行而使34名球队人员被隔离检疫,从而在首发阵容中创造了5位初秀并在替补席上再有7位。
translation.reference: 与此同时，芒斯特队在最近命运多舛的南非联合橄榄球锦标赛之旅后，由于隔离而致使 34 名队员缺阵，这使得首发的 15 人中有 5 名队员初次登场，另有 7 名替补队员。

translation.en: Crucially, however, Ireland stars such as Tadhg Beirne, Peter O'Mahony, Conor Murray and Keith Earls were present to stiffen their ranks.
translation.zh: 然而，至关重要的是，像塔德赫•贝尔尼、彼得•奥马奥尼、康纳•默里和基思•厄尔斯等爱尔兰明星都出席了比赛，为他们的队伍鼓气。
translation.source: Crucially, however, Ireland stars such as Tadhg Beirne, Peter O'Mahony, Conor Murray and Keith Earls were present to stiffen their ranks.
translation.medium: 关键性的是，然而，爱尔兰明星如Tadhg Beirne、Peter O'Mahony、Conor Murray和Keith Earls出席了巩固他们的行列。
translation.reference: 然而，至关重要的是，像塔德赫•贝尔尼、彼得•奥马奥尼、康纳•默里和基思•厄尔斯等爱尔兰明星都出席了比赛，为他们的队伍鼓气。

translation.en: For all the absentees, it was an enjoyable spectacle where it appeared at times anything could happen, at least until Munster showed the extraordinary depth of their playing resources to pull clear.
translation.zh: 对于所有缺席的球员来说，这是一个令人愉快的场面，似乎任何事情都有可能不时地发生，至少在芒斯特展示出他们非凡的板凳深度拉开距离之前是这样的。
translation.source: For all the absentees, it was an enjoyable spectacle where it appeared at times anything could happen, at least until Munster showed the extraordinary depth of their playing resources to pull clear.
translation.medium: 对所有缺阵的人来说,这是一场极具娱乐性的比赛,在这场比赛中,任何事情都有可能发生,至少到了最后,慕尼黑表现出了他们极其丰富的比赛资源,他们将比分拉开。
translation.reference: 对于所有缺席的球员来说，这是一个令人愉快的场面，似乎任何事情都有可能不时地发生，至少在芒斯特展示出他们非凡的板凳深度拉开距离之前是这样的。

translation.en: Wasps' Covid-affected start to the day was compounded when play got underway, with Thomas Young denied a certain try by O'Mahony's excellent covering tackle.
translation.zh: 比赛开始后，黄蜂队受新冠的影响变得更加严重，托马斯·杨拒绝了奥马奥尼出色的掩护拦截。
translation.source: Wasps' Covid-affected start to the day was compounded when play got underway, with Thomas Young denied a certain try by O'Mahony's excellent covering tackle.
translation.medium: 黄蜂队受到新型冠状病毒影响的开局一波未平，比赛一开始就被延迟。汤玛斯?
translation.reference: 比赛开始后，黄蜂队受新冠的影响变得更加严重，托马斯·杨拒绝了奥马奥尼出色的掩护拦截。

translation.en: And while Joey Carbery sent a penalty between the uprights to draw first blood for Munster, Jimmy Gopperth struck the crossbar to continue the two-time champions' unfortunate opening.
translation.zh: 当乔伊·卡伯里在两根立柱之间罚出点球，让芒斯特出师告捷时，吉米·戈伯斯击中横梁，延续了两届冠军球队不幸的开局。
translation.source: And while Joey Carbery sent a penalty between the uprights to draw first blood for Munster, Jimmy Gopperth struck the crossbar to continue the two-time champions' unfortunate opening.
translation.medium: 乔伊·卡尔贝里在门将之间射门得分 帮助慕内斯特队首先破门
translation.reference: 当乔伊·卡伯里在两根立柱之间罚出点球，让芒斯特出师告捷时，吉米·戈伯斯击中横梁，延续了两届冠军球队不幸的开局。

translation.en: But their scrum was offering a foothold in the game and it took feverish defence to keep their maul at bay until they produced the first of two turnovers in quick succession.
translation.zh: 但他们的争球为他们在比赛中提供了一个立足点，他们需要疯狂防守来阻止他们的惨败，直到他们第一次连续两次迅速造成失误。
translation.source: But their scrum was offering a foothold in the game and it took feverish defence to keep their maul at bay until they produced the first of two turnovers in quick succession.
translation.medium: 但他们的阵容给了他们在比赛中立足的机会,而要想将他们的阵容压制住,直到他们制造了两次反击的第一个机会。
translation.reference: 但他们的争球为他们在比赛中提供了一个立足点，他们需要疯狂防守来阻止他们的惨败，直到他们第一次连续两次迅速造成失误。

translation.en: Munster were fighting for every ball in defiance of their absentees and their victory prospects received a dramatic boost when Shields was shown his dubious red card, with referee Romain Poite saying his shoulder had caught Kilcoyne's neck.
translation.zh: 芒斯特不顾主力的缺席，为每一个球而战，当希尔兹因为主裁判罗曼·波伊特说他的肩膀卡住了基尔科因的脖子而被出示可疑的红牌时，他们的胜利前景得到了戏剧性的加强。
translation.source: Munster were fighting for every ball in defiance of their absentees and their victory prospects received a dramatic boost when Shields was shown his dubious red card, with referee Romain Poite saying his shoulder had caught Kilcoyne's neck.
translation.medium: 蒙斯特队抗争每一次得分机会，他们的胜利前景也因为Shields被出示红牌而大大增强，裁判Poite称Shields的肩膀碰到了Kilcoyne的脖子。
translation.reference: 芒斯特不顾主力的缺席，为每一个球而战，当希尔兹因为主裁判罗曼·波伊特说他的肩膀卡住了基尔科因的脖子而被出示可疑的红牌时，他们的胜利前景得到了戏剧性的加强。

translation.en: Carbery directed a simple penalty at the post and while he was on target soon after, a dramatic twist followed as Wasps plundered a stunning try through Barbeary.
translation.zh: 卡贝里在门柱上简单地罚了一个点球，当他很快瞄准目标时，一个戏剧性的转折发生了，黄蜂队通过巴巴里完成了一次漂亮的尝试。
translation.source: Carbery directed a simple penalty at the post and while he was on target soon after, a dramatic twist followed as Wasps plundered a stunning try through Barbeary.
translation.medium: 卡伯利在门前指导了一次简单的罚球，而当他很快就再次得分的时候，一场戏剧性的扭转发生了，因为Wasps通过Barbeary抢得了一次精彩的进球。
translation.reference: 卡贝里在门柱上简单地罚了一个点球，当他很快瞄准目标时，一个戏剧性的转折发生了，黄蜂队通过巴巴里完成了一次漂亮的尝试。

translation.en: It concluded an exhilarating spell of end-to-end rugby in which the rivals took it in turns to attack from deep and, having been at the heart of the home advances, Barbeary delivered the telling blow.
translation.zh: 这场比赛结束了一段令人兴奋的连续橄榄球比赛，在这场比赛中，对手们轮流纵深进攻，作为主场进攻的核心，巴巴里发出了有力的一击。
translation.source: It concluded an exhilarating spell of end-to-end rugby in which the rivals took it in turns to attack from deep and, having been at the heart of the home advances, Barbeary delivered the telling blow.
translation.medium: 它总结了一种兴奋人心的魔术从端到端的橄榄球,在那里的竞争者以一种轮番的方式从深入攻击,并且在被本地推进的核心,巴巴拉提供了决定性的打击。
translation.reference: 这场比赛结束了一段令人兴奋的连续橄榄球比赛，在这场比赛中，对手们轮流纵深进攻，作为主场进攻的核心，巴巴里发出了有力的一击。

translation.en: A kind bounce off Murray's kick presented Earls with the simplest of tries as Munster hit back and then Frost departed for the sin-bin as the home side were reduced to 13.
translation.zh: 穆雷的一脚射门给了厄尔斯一个最简单的带球触地得分，芒斯特回击，然后弗罗斯特被罚下场，主队人数减少到 13 人。
translation.source: A kind bounce off Murray's kick presented Earls with the simplest of tries as Munster hit back and then Frost departed for the sin-bin as the home side were reduced to 13.
translation.medium: 一个由Murray的踢球反弹的友好,给Earls提供了一个最简单的的尝试,在Munster打击回来,并且然后Frost离开了为歧视的篮子,该侧面被减少到13.
translation.reference: 穆雷的一脚射门给了厄尔斯一个最简单的带球触地得分，芒斯特回击，然后弗罗斯特被罚下场，主队人数减少到 13 人。

translation.en: It did not take long for the advantage in personnel to be felt as Beirne started a breakout try that ended with full-back Campbell producing a brilliant finish.
translation.zh: 没过多久，在人员上的优势就显现出来了，贝尔尼开始了一次突破性的带球触地得分，以后卫坎贝尔的精彩进球结束。
translation.source: It did not take long for the advantage in personnel to be felt as Beirne started a breakout try that ended with full-back Campbell producing a brilliant finish.
translation.medium: 人员上的优势并没有持续太久,贝伦发动的反击最终由后卫坎伯产生绝杀进球。
translation.reference: 没过多久，在人员上的优势就显现出来了，贝尔尼开始了一次突破性的带球触地得分，以后卫坎贝尔的精彩进球结束。

translation.en: And Munster were out of sight in the 49th minute when a loose pass during a promising counter-attack fell for Conway to scoop up and complete a simple run-in.
translation.zh: 第 49 分钟，芒斯特出现视线盲区，在一次充满希望的反击中传球失误，康威完成了一次简单的跑进。
translation.source: And Munster were out of sight in the 49th minute when a loose pass during a promising counter-attack fell for Conway to scoop up and complete a simple run-in.
translation.medium: 在第49分钟，慕尼斯特队在反击中失误，这次机会落到了康威脚下，他轻松的进球。
translation.reference: 第 49 分钟，芒斯特出现视线盲区，在一次充满希望的反击中传球失误，康威完成了一次简单的跑进。

translation.en: Hooker Scott Buckley, man of the match on his Munster debut, was the next over from a lineout move and that was the game won, although Michael Le Bourgeois picked a quality line to improve Wasps' final score.
translation.zh: 在芒斯特的处子秀上，本场最佳球员前场中锋斯科特·巴克利是下一名外线球员，这是比赛的胜利，尽管迈克尔·勒·布里克选择了一条高质量的线路来提高黄蜂队的最后得分。
translation.source: Hooker Scott Buckley, man of the match on his Munster debut, was the next over from a lineout move and that was the game won, although Michael Le Bourgeois picked a quality line to improve Wasps' final score.
translation.medium: 在他的首次参加"慕尼斯特"比赛中，获得"最佳球员"的斯科特·巴克利，在接下来的一场比赛中，打出了一个精彩的比赛，并帮助"沃斯"队获得了胜利，尽管在最后阶段，麦克尔·勒布里乔斯也打出了一次精彩的比赛。
translation.reference: 在芒斯特的处子秀上，本场最佳球员前场中锋斯科特·巴克利是下一名外线球员，这是比赛的胜利，尽管迈克尔·勒·布里克选择了一条高质量的线路来提高黄蜂队的最后得分。

translation.en: France reacts to rival offer of US frigates to Greece
translation.zh: 法国对美国向希腊提供护卫舰的竞争性报价做出反应
translation.source: France reacts to rival offer of US frigates to Greece
translation.medium: 法国对美国向希腊出售护卫舰感到震惊
translation.reference: 法国对美国向希腊提供护卫舰的竞争性报价做出反应

translation.en: The defense ministries of France and Greece have both confirmed that a competing offer from the US will have no impact on an already "signed" and "final" multibillion deal to purchase French Belharra frigates.
translation.zh: 法国和希腊国防部都确认，美国的竞争性报价将不会影响已经“签署”和“最终”数十亿美元的希腊购买法国贝尔哈拉护卫舰的协议。
translation.source: The defense ministries of France and Greece have both confirmed that a competing offer from the US will have no impact on an already "signed" and "final" multibillion deal to purchase French Belharra frigates.
translation.medium: 法国和希腊两国国防部都证实,来自美国的竞争性报价不会影响到已经签署的采购法国贝尔哈拉级驱逐舰的多亿美元协议。
translation.reference: 法国和希腊国防部都确认，美国的竞争性报价将不会影响已经“签署”和“最终”数十亿美元的希腊购买法国贝尔哈拉护卫舰的协议。

translation.en: France's Ministry of Armed Forces stated on Saturday that a defense contract with Athens had already been "initialled a few days ago," before the US State Department announced its approval of a potential sale of American frigates.
translation.zh: 法国武装部队周六表示，在美国国务院宣布批准出售美国护卫舰之前，法国与希腊的防务合同已经“草签了几天”。
translation.source: France's Ministry of Armed Forces stated on Saturday that a defense contract with Athens had already been "initialled a few days ago," before the US State Department announced its approval of a potential sale of American frigates.
translation.medium: 法国武装部队部长办公室周六发表声明说，与雅典签署防御合同的工作已在美国国务院宣布可能销售美国护卫舰前几天"初步敲定"。
translation.reference: 法国武装部队周六表示，在美国国务院宣布批准出售美国护卫舰之前，法国与希腊的防务合同已经“草签了几天”。

translation.en: Since we have been in discussion with the Greeks, the American offer is no longer on the table...
translation.zh: 从我们与希腊人开始讨论之后，美国的报价就不在谈判桌上了。
translation.source: Since we have been in discussion with the Greeks, the American offer is no longer on the table...
translation.medium: 自从我们开始和希腊人讨论以来...美国的提议已经不存在了...
translation.reference: 从我们与希腊人开始讨论之后，美国的报价就不在谈判桌上了。

translation.en: We also signed the contract with the Greeks.
translation.zh: 我们也和希腊人签订了合同。
translation.source: We also signed the contract with the Greeks.
translation.medium: 我们还和希腊人签了合同
translation.reference: 我们也和希腊人签订了合同。

translation.en: Greece's Defense Ministry also confirmed that the deal with Paris was "final," since it had been negotiated at the "highest level possible" and "personally announced" by the Greek PM Kyriakos Mitsotakis.
translation.zh: 希腊国防部也证实，与巴黎的协议是“最终的”，因为它是在“可能的最高级别”进行谈判，并由希腊总理克里亚科斯·米佐塔基斯 (Kyriakos Mitsotakis)“亲自宣布”的。
translation.source: Greece's Defense Ministry also confirmed that the deal with Paris was "final," since it had been negotiated at the "highest level possible" and "personally announced" by the Greek PM Kyriakos Mitsotakis.
translation.medium: 希腊国防部也证实了同巴黎的这一交易是"最后的"，因为这一交易是在"尽可能最高的一级"上进行了谈判，并且由希腊总理基里亚克斯·密索塔基斯亲自宣布。
translation.reference: 希腊国防部也证实，与巴黎的协议是“最终的”，因为它是在“可能的最高级别”进行谈判，并由希腊总理克里亚科斯·米佐塔基斯 (Kyriakos Mitsotakis)“亲自宣布”的。

translation.en: The finalized contracts are allegedly expected to be ratified by the Greek Parliament "soon."
translation.zh: 据称，最终敲定的合同预计将“很快”得到希腊议会的批准。
translation.source: The finalized contracts are allegedly expected to be ratified by the Greek Parliament "soon."
translation.medium: 最后敲定的合同预计不久就能得到希腊议会的批准。
translation.reference: 据称，最终敲定的合同预计将“很快”得到希腊议会的批准。

translation.en: The US Defense Security Cooperation Agency said on Friday it had approved the sale for $6.9 billion of four Lockheed Martin combat frigates, and a separate $2.5 billion program to upgrade Greece's MEKO class frigates.
translation.zh: 美国国防安全合作局周五表示，它已经批准以 69 亿美元的价格出售四艘洛克希德·马丁公司的战斗护卫舰，以及另一项价值 25 亿美元的计划来升级希腊的 MEKO 级护卫舰。
translation.source: The US Defense Security Cooperation Agency said on Friday it had approved the sale for $6.9 billion of four Lockheed Martin combat frigates, and a separate $2.5 billion program to upgrade Greece's MEKO class frigates.
translation.medium: 美国国防安全合作机构上周五表示，该机构已经批准了价值69亿美元的四艘洛克希德马丁级战斗护卫舰的销售合同，还批准了价值25亿美元的希腊MEKO级护卫舰升级改造方案。
translation.reference: 美国国防安全合作局周五表示，它已经批准以 69 亿美元的价格出售四艘洛克希德·马丁公司的战斗护卫舰，以及另一项价值 25 亿美元的计划来升级希腊的 MEKO 级护卫舰。

translation.en: The announcement triggered some concerns over the Athens-Paris agreement, especially after a long-existing submarine construction "deal of the century" between France and Australia was abruptly tanked by a bombshell AUKUS pact in September, without any prior warning.
translation.zh: 这一声明引发了对雅典-巴黎协议的一些担忧，特别是在法国和澳大利亚之间的长期潜艇建造“世纪合同”于 9 月在事先没有收到任何预警，突然因为爆炸性的 AUKUS 协议而遭到毁约的情况下。
translation.source: The announcement triggered some concerns over the Athens-Paris agreement, especially after a long-existing submarine construction "deal of the century" between France and Australia was abruptly tanked by a bombshell AUKUS pact in September, without any prior warning.
translation.medium: 这一宣布引发了人们对雅典-巴黎协议的一些关切，尤其是在法国和澳大利亚之间长期存在的潜水艇制造"本世纪最大的交易"在今年9月突然被突如其来的奥克斯协议所取消之后。
translation.reference: 这一声明引发了对雅典-巴黎协议的一些担忧，特别是在法国和澳大利亚之间的长期潜艇建造“世纪合同”于 9 月在事先没有收到任何预警，突然因为爆炸性的 AUKUS 协议而遭到毁约的情况下。

translation.en: Outraged Paris accused Washington and Canberra of a "stab in the back," while just two weeks later Macron took the stage with the Greek PM to personally announce the sale of at least three French warships to Athens for around $3.5 billion, saying it was time to "stop being naive" while touting the new deal as a sign of "Europe's strategic autonomy and sovereignty."
translation.zh: 愤怒的巴黎指责华盛顿和堪培拉“在背后捅刀子”，而仅仅两周后，马克龙与希腊总理一起登台，亲自宣布向雅典出售至少三艘法国军舰，价格约为 35 亿美元，声称是时候“停止天真”了，同时把新协议吹捧为“欧洲战略自治和主权”的标志。
translation.source: Outraged Paris accused Washington and Canberra of a "stab in the back," while just two weeks later Macron took the stage with the Greek PM to personally announce the sale of at least three French warships to Athens for around $3.5 billion, saying it was time to "stop being naive" while touting the new deal as a sign of "Europe's strategic autonomy and sovereignty."
translation.medium: 十分愤怒的巴黎指责华盛顿和堪培拉背叛,而两周后马克龙与希腊总理一起登上舞台,亲自宣布向雅典出售至少三艘法国战舰,价值约35亿美元,并表示"停止幼稚"的时候到了,同时宣传新的交易是"欧洲战略自主和主权"的标志。
translation.reference: 愤怒的巴黎指责华盛顿和堪培拉“在背后捅刀子”，而仅仅两周后，马克龙与希腊总理一起登台，亲自宣布向雅典出售至少三艘法国军舰，价格约为 35 亿美元，声称是时候“停止天真”了，同时把新协议吹捧为“欧洲战略自治和主权”的标志。

translation.en: This time around, according to the French military, the US "had warned us that this announcement was going to come out" and that Americans allegedly had "no inclination to go further" with an actual sale of their frigates.
translation.zh: 据法国军方称，这一次，美国“警告我们，将会公布这一声明”，而且据称美国“无意继续”出售他们的护卫舰。
translation.source: This time around, according to the French military, the US "had warned us that this announcement was going to come out" and that Americans allegedly had "no inclination to go further" with an actual sale of their frigates.
translation.medium: 这一回，据法国军方透露，美国"向我们发出警告，即这一宣布即将发表"，而且美国人声称"不会再进一步"，即实际出售它们的护卫舰。
translation.reference: 据法国军方称，这一次，美国“警告我们，将会公布这一声明”，而且据称美国“无意继续”出售他们的护卫舰。

translation.en: Customer gets mad at me because I didn't know he needed help
translation.zh: 顾客生我的气，因为我不知道他需要帮助
translation.source: Customer gets mad at me because I didn't know he needed help
translation.medium: 一个顾客气我,因为我不知道他需要帮忙
translation.reference: 顾客生我的气，因为我不知道他需要帮助

translation.en: I work at a grocery store shopping for pickup/delivery orders.
translation.zh: 我在杂货店工作，负责给提货单/配送单拣货。
translation.source: I work at a grocery store shopping for pickup/delivery orders.
translation.medium: 我在一个杂货店工作订货送货
translation.reference: 我在杂货店工作，负责给提货单/配送单拣货。

translation.en: I often have customers ask where an item is and they ask in the form of a greeting + question, or just a question.
translation.zh: 经常有顾客问我商品在哪里，他们的问话方式是“问候+问题”，或者只是问问题。
translation.source: I often have customers ask where an item is and they ask in the form of a greeting + question, or just a question.
translation.medium: 我经常会有顾客问我在哪里某个项目,他们会问在问好+问题,或者只是一个问题。
translation.reference: 经常有顾客问我商品在哪里，他们的问话方式是“问候+问题”，或者只是问问题。

translation.en: I also have customers that just say hello/good morning/etc.
translation.zh: 我也会对顾客说你好/早上好等等。
translation.source: I also have customers that just say hello/good morning/etc.
translation.medium: 我的一些顾客来说早上好/晚上好等等
translation.reference: 我也会对顾客说你好/早上好等等。

translation.en: I passed by a customer who said hello, and I said hello back, then waited a few seconds to see if he had a question.
translation.zh: 有一次，我从一位顾客身边走过，他向我问好，我便回之以问候，然后等了几秒钟，看他是否要问什么。
translation.source: I passed by a customer who said hello, and I said hello back, then waited a few seconds to see if he had a question.
translation.medium: 我走过一个顾客他说你好我也说你好然后等了几秒看他有没有问题
translation.reference: 有一次，我从一位顾客身边走过，他向我问好，我便回之以问候，然后等了几秒钟，看他是否要问什么。

translation.en: He didn't say anything else, so I moved on and continued shopping.
translation.zh: 但是他什么也没说，所以我走开了。
translation.source: He didn't say anything else, so I moved on and continued shopping.
translation.medium: 他什么都没说,我就继续逛了
translation.reference: 但是他什么也没说，所以我走开了。

translation.en: He then said "hello?" again, in a rude tone, and asked if I worked here angrily.
translation.zh: 然后他又用带着怨气的语气说了一声“你好？”，生气地问我是不是这里的工作人员。
translation.source: He then said "hello?" again, in a rude tone, and asked if I worked here angrily.
translation.medium: 他随后又用粗鲁的语气问我是不是这里的员工
translation.reference: 然后他又用带着怨气的语气说了一声“你好？”，生气地问我是不是这里的工作人员。

translation.en: I said I did, and he asked where an item was, again in a rude tone.
translation.zh: 我说是的，他就问我某样商品在哪里，语气还是那样不高兴。
translation.source: I said I did, and he asked where an item was, again in a rude tone.
translation.medium: 我回答了他又问我哪儿的东西在哪儿
translation.reference: 我说是的，他就问我某样商品在哪里，语气还是那样不高兴。

translation.en: I pointed where I believed it would be located, and said that I thought it should be there but it looks like we were out of it.
translation.zh: 我指了一个位置，我觉得应该是那里，但实际上不是。
translation.source: I pointed where I believed it would be located, and said that I thought it should be there but it looks like we were out of it.
translation.medium: 我指出我认为它应该在那里,但看来我们找不到.
translation.reference: 我指了一个位置，我觉得应该是那里，但实际上不是。

translation.en: He then just said "forget it" angrily and walked away.
translation.zh: 然后，他就说了一句“算了”，就走了。
translation.source: He then just said "forget it" angrily and walked away.
translation.medium: 他随后愤怒地说"算了吧"就走了。
translation.reference: 然后，他就说了一句“算了”，就走了。

translation.en: How was I supposed to have known he needed help?
translation.zh: 我怎么知道他需要我的帮助呢？
translation.source: How was I supposed to have known he needed help?
translation.medium: 我怎么知道他需要帮助?
translation.reference: 我怎么知道他需要我的帮助呢？

translation.en: He just said "hello" which plenty of customers say to be polite.
translation.zh: 他只是说“你好”，很多顾客出于礼貌都会这样说。
translation.source: He just said "hello" which plenty of customers say to be polite.
translation.medium: 他只是打了招呼,很多顾客都这样
translation.reference: 他只是说“你好”，很多顾客出于礼貌都会这样说。

translation.en: This is the only customer I've had who has just said hello without asking a question, then expected me to know he needed help.
translation.zh: 这是我遇到过的唯一一位没有问题，只有问候，然后又指望我知道他需要帮助的顾客。
translation.source: This is the only customer I've had who has just said hello without asking a question, then expected me to know he needed help.
translation.medium: 这是唯一一个顾客没问问题就打招呼 然后期望我知道他需要帮忙
translation.reference: 这是我遇到过的唯一一位没有问题，只有问候，然后又指望我知道他需要帮助的顾客。

translation.en: He didn't say anything rude to me, but his tone of voice was extremely angry the whole time, even though I tried to help him.
translation.zh: 他没有对我说任何不礼貌的话，但从他的语气能听出来，他很生气，即使我已经试着帮他了。
translation.source: He didn't say anything rude to me, but his tone of voice was extremely angry the whole time, even though I tried to help him.
translation.medium: 他没对我说什么冒犯的话,但是他整个时间的语气都很生气,虽然我一直都在帮他。
translation.reference: 他没有对我说任何不礼貌的话，但从他的语气能听出来，他很生气，即使我已经试着帮他了。

translation.en: Heavy snowfall wreaks havoc in Serbia and much of Balkans
translation.zh: 大雪在塞尔维亚和巴尔干半岛大部分地区造成严重破坏
translation.source: Heavy snowfall wreaks havoc in Serbia and much of Balkans
translation.medium: 暴雪致使塞尔维亚和巴尔干半岛多地受灾
translation.reference: 大雪在塞尔维亚和巴尔干半岛大部分地区造成严重破坏

translation.en: Heavy snowfall wreaked havoc in much of the Balkans on Sunday, disrupting public transportation.
translation.zh: 周日，大雪在巴尔干半岛大部分地区造成严重破坏，扰乱了公共交通。
translation.source: Heavy snowfall wreaked havoc in much of the Balkans on Sunday, disrupting public transportation.
translation.medium: 暴风雪星期天肆虐巴尔干半岛，破坏公共交通。
translation.reference: 周日，大雪在巴尔干半岛大部分地区造成严重破坏，扰乱了公共交通。

translation.en: Flights were cancelled at Serbia's main airport in Belgrade on Sunday and many areas reported power cuts and damage to buildings.
translation.zh: 周日，位于贝尔格莱德的塞尔维亚主要机场的航班被取消，许多地区断电，建筑物受损。
translation.source: Flights were cancelled at Serbia's main airport in Belgrade on Sunday and many areas reported power cuts and damage to buildings.
translation.medium: 周日,塞尔维亚首都贝尔格莱德的主要机场取消了所有航班,许多地区也报道停电和建筑物受损。
translation.reference: 周日，位于贝尔格莱德的塞尔维亚主要机场的航班被取消，许多地区断电，建筑物受损。

translation.en: Much of western Serbia was without electricity as authorities warned against unnecessary travel and appealed to people in Serbia to conserve power.
translation.zh: 塞尔维亚西部大部分地区停电，当局警告不进行非必要的旅行，并呼吁塞尔维亚人节约用电。
translation.source: Much of western Serbia was without electricity as authorities warned against unnecessary travel and appealed to people in Serbia to conserve power.
translation.medium: 塞尔维亚西部的一大部分地区停电，当局警告人们不要进行不必要的旅行，并呼吁塞尔维亚民众节约用电。
translation.reference: 塞尔维亚西部大部分地区停电，当局警告不进行非必要的旅行，并呼吁塞尔维亚人节约用电。

translation.en: There was some damage to cars and buildings in Belgrade due to the snow.
translation.zh: 大雪对贝尔格莱德的汽车和建筑物造成了一些损坏。
translation.source: There was some damage to cars and buildings in Belgrade due to the snow.
translation.medium: 由于降雪,贝尔格莱德的部分车辆和建筑物受损。
translation.reference: 大雪对贝尔格莱德的汽车和建筑物造成了一些损坏。

translation.en: Several flights from and to Belgrade's main airport were cancelled because of the weather conditions and a brief power cut to the main terminal, Belgrade media reported.
translation.zh: 据贝尔格莱德媒体报道，由于天气状况和主要航站楼短暂断电，几架往返贝尔格莱德主要机场的航班被取消。
translation.source: Several flights from and to Belgrade's main airport were cancelled because of the weather conditions and a brief power cut to the main terminal, Belgrade media reported.
translation.medium: 由于天气状况以及贝尔格莱德主机场出现的短暂停电，贝尔格莱德媒体报道说，来自和前往贝尔格莱德的数趟航班被取消。
translation.reference: 据贝尔格莱德媒体报道，由于天气状况和主要航站楼短暂断电，几架往返贝尔格莱德主要机场的航班被取消。

translation.en: A highway leading to the airport was closed for several hours because of a traffic jam caused by the snowfall.
translation.zh: 由于降雪造成的交通堵塞，通往机场的高速公路关闭了几个小时。
translation.source: A highway leading to the airport was closed for several hours because of a traffic jam caused by the snowfall.
translation.medium: 由于降雪造成交通堵塞，通往机场的一条高速公路被关闭数小时。
translation.reference: 由于降雪造成的交通堵塞，通往机场的高速公路关闭了几个小时。

translation.en: Passengers on a local train to Belgrade were stuck in snow for seven hours before they were provided bus transportation to the capital.
translation.zh: 前往贝尔格莱德的当地火车上的乘客被困在雪中 7 个小时后，才被安排乘坐公共汽车前往首都。
translation.source: Passengers on a local train to Belgrade were stuck in snow for seven hours before they were provided bus transportation to the capital.
translation.medium: 当地到贝尔格莱德的火车上的旅客在被运送到首都的大巴上待了7个小时之后才得到解救。
translation.reference: 前往贝尔格莱德的当地火车上的乘客被困在雪中 7 个小时后，才被安排乘坐公共汽车前往首都。

translation.en: Emergency services have been assisting authorities in the cleanup operation, while another alert for more snow and ice has been issued.
translation.zh: 紧急服务部门一直在协助当局进行清理工作，同时又发布了有关更多冰雪的警报。
translation.source: Emergency services have been assisting authorities in the cleanup operation, while another alert for more snow and ice has been issued.
translation.medium: 急救人员已经帮助当局开展清理工作，同时也发布了新的暴风雪和冰冻警报。
translation.reference: 紧急服务部门一直在协助当局进行清理工作，同时又发布了有关更多冰雪的警报。

translation.en: Meanwhile, in Bulgaria, heavy rains and major floods have been ravaging southern parts of the country over the weekend, forcing authorities there to declare a state of emergency.
translation.zh: 与此同时，保加利亚南部地区周末遭遇暴雨和大洪水，迫使当地政府宣布进入紧急状态。
translation.source: Meanwhile, in Bulgaria, heavy rains and major floods have been ravaging southern parts of the country over the weekend, forcing authorities there to declare a state of emergency.
translation.medium: 与此同时，保加利亚南部地区周末遭遇强降雨和洪水，当地主管部门已经宣布进入紧急状态。
translation.reference: 与此同时，保加利亚南部地区周末遭遇暴雨和大洪水，迫使当地政府宣布进入紧急状态。

translation.en: The worst-hit areas were in the Smolyan region, near the border with Greece, where rivers burst their banks to cause the overflowing of roads and the flooding of homes.
translation.zh: 受灾最严重的地区是靠近希腊边境的斯莫利亚地区，那里的河流决堤，导致道路泛滥，房屋被淹没。
translation.source: The worst-hit areas were in the Smolyan region, near the border with Greece, where rivers burst their banks to cause the overflowing of roads and the flooding of homes.
translation.medium: 受灾最严重的地区是与希腊接壤的斯摩利亚地区,当地的河流泛滥,导致道路被冲毁,房屋被淹。
translation.reference: 受灾最严重的地区是靠近希腊边境的斯莫利亚地区，那里的河流决堤，导致道路泛滥，房屋被淹没。

translation.en: Several trucks were trapped in a landslide on an intercity road.
translation.zh: 几辆卡车被困在一条发生滑坡的城际公路。
translation.source: Several trucks were trapped in a landslide on an intercity road.
translation.medium: 市际公路上发生山体滑坡，数辆卡车被困。
translation.reference: 几辆卡车被困在一条发生滑坡的城际公路。

translation.en: Strong winds disrupted power supply in dozens of villages, authorities said.
translation.zh: 当局称，强风中断了数十个村庄的电力供应。
translation.source: Strong winds disrupted power supply in dozens of villages, authorities said.
translation.medium: 几十个村的电力供应因强风受到破坏，当局称。
translation.reference: 当局称，强风中断了数十个村庄的电力供应。

translation.en: Further south in Albania, authorities mobilised police, army and emergency forces to cope with floods following three days of continuous rainfall and snow.
translation.zh: 在更远的南部阿尔巴尼亚，当局动员警察、军队和紧急部队应对连续三天的雨雪造成的洪水。
translation.source: Further south in Albania, authorities mobilised police, army and emergency forces to cope with floods following three days of continuous rainfall and snow.
translation.medium: 阿尔巴尼亚南部地区的当局动员警察、军队和紧急力量以应对连续三天的雨雪天气造成的洪水。
translation.reference: 在更远的南部阿尔巴尼亚，当局动员警察、军队和紧急部队应对连续三天的雨雪造成的洪水。

translation.en: The Vjosa River in the south flooded many areas.
translation.zh: 南部的 Vjosa 河淹没了许多地区。
translation.source: The Vjosa River in the south flooded many areas.
translation.medium: 南部的维约萨河洪水泛滥,许多地区被淹.
translation.reference: 南部的 Vjosa 河淹没了许多地区。

translation.en: An older couple who had stayed overnight on the rooftop of their house in southwest Albania was rescued by police in the morning.
translation.zh: 一对在阿尔巴尼亚西南部的屋顶上过夜的老夫妇在早上被警方救出。
translation.source: An older couple who had stayed overnight on the rooftop of their house in southwest Albania was rescued by police in the morning.
translation.medium: 阿尔巴尼亚西南部一对老年夫妇在屋顶上过了一夜。
translation.reference: 一对在阿尔巴尼亚西南部的屋顶上过夜的老夫妇在早上被警方救出。

translation.en: Many roads were temporarily blocked by landslides in the south.
translation.zh: 南部的许多道路因山体滑坡而暂时被封锁。
translation.source: Many roads were temporarily blocked by landslides in the south.
translation.medium: 由于山体滑坡，南部的道路被临时封锁。
translation.reference: 南部的许多道路因山体滑坡而暂时被封锁。

translation.en: Elsewhere in the northeast and southeast of the country, heavy snow has hampered or temporarily blocked traffic.
translation.zh: 在该国东北部和东南部的其他地方，大雪阻碍或暂时中断了交通。
translation.source: Elsewhere in the northeast and southeast of the country, heavy snow has hampered or temporarily blocked traffic.
translation.medium: 芬兰其他地区也遭遇了暴雪天气，导致交通中断。
translation.reference: 在该国东北部和东南部的其他地方，大雪阻碍或暂时中断了交通。

translation.en: We had power go out a couple of times.
translation.zh: 我们经历过几次停电的情况。
translation.source: We had power go out a couple of times.
translation.medium: 有几次停电
translation.reference: 我们经历过几次停电的情况。

translation.en: Step 1: Get someone on the door immediately.
translation.zh: 步骤 1：马上派人去守住门口。
translation.source: Step 1: Get someone on the door immediately.
translation.medium: 第一步:派人守在门口
translation.reference: 步骤 1：马上派人去守住门口。

translation.en: They are security now.
translation.zh: 他们现在就是保安。
translation.source: They are security now.
translation.medium: 他们现在是安全了
translation.reference: 他们现在就是保安。

translation.en: Don't let anyone in and pay attention to people as they leave (esp kids' hands).
translation.zh: 不要让任何人进来，并注意出去的顾客（尤其是孩子的手）。
translation.source: Don't let anyone in and pay attention to people as they leave (esp kids' hands).
translation.medium: 不要让任何人进来, 关注人们离开(尤其是儿童的手)。
translation.reference: 不要让任何人进来，并注意出去的顾客（尤其是孩子的手）。

translation.en: Step 2: Call Store Manager if they aren't there.
translation.zh: 步骤 2：如果门店经理不在现场，那就打电话给他。
translation.source: Step 2: Call Store Manager if they aren't there.
translation.medium: 第二步:如果找不到,就打电话给店长
translation.reference: 步骤 2：如果门店经理不在现场，那就打电话给他。

translation.en: Step 3: Those that are at tills and anyone else really are free to wait a couple minutes to see if backup generators can get us going again.
translation.zh: 步骤 3：让那些在收银台的顾客和其他人等待几分钟，看看备用发电机能否让电力恢复。
translation.source: Step 3: Those that are at tills and anyone else really are free to wait a couple minutes to see if backup generators can get us going again.
translation.medium: 第三步:现在值班的人和其他人都可以等几分钟看看后备发电机能否让我们继续工作
translation.reference: 步骤 3：让那些在收银台的顾客和其他人等待几分钟，看看备用发电机能否让电力恢复。

translation.en: Step 4: Go throughout the store and getting every non employee to leave.
translation.zh: 步骤 4：搜寻全店，让所有非员工人员离开，
translation.source: Step 4: Go throughout the store and getting every non employee to leave.
translation.medium: 第四步: 到处逛逛,让所有的顾客都离开
translation.reference: 步骤 4：搜寻全店，让所有非员工人员离开，

translation.en: As well as every cart brought to the front.
translation.zh: 并把每辆购物车都推到前面。
translation.source: As well as every cart brought to the front.
translation.medium: 以及前面的每辆车
translation.reference: 并把每辆购物车都推到前面。

translation.en: Step 5: Go through the carts looking for anything cold and produce.
translation.zh: 步骤 5：把购物车里需要冷藏的加工的商品拣出来。
translation.source: Step 5: Go through the carts looking for anything cold and produce.
translation.medium: 第五步:去购物车找冷冻食物和水果
translation.reference: 步骤 5：把购物车里需要冷藏的加工的商品拣出来。

translation.en: Step 6: Return said cold/produce.
translation.zh: 步骤 6：把它们送回到冷藏区/加工区。
translation.source: Step 6: Return said cold/produce.
translation.medium: 第6步:把冷冻食物拿回去
translation.reference: 步骤 6：把它们送回到冷藏区/加工区。

translation.en: Step 7: Cover all non-doored cold i.e. cheese/meat/veggies, etc.
translation.zh: 步骤 7：盖好所有不带门冷藏区的商品，如奶酪/肉类/蔬菜等。
translation.source: Step 7: Cover all non-doored cold i.e. cheese/meat/veggies, etc.
translation.medium: 第七步:盖住所有没有门的冷冻食品,例如奶酪/肉/蔬菜等.
translation.reference: 步骤 7：盖好所有不带门冷藏区的商品，如奶酪/肉类/蔬菜等。

translation.en: Step 8: Sign our names on a sheet of paper as we left to be clocked out.
translation.zh: 步骤 8：离开时在纸上签名，代替下班打卡。
translation.source: Step 8: Sign our names on a sheet of paper as we left to be clocked out.
translation.medium: 第八步:在一张纸上签名,表示我们已经离开了.
translation.reference: 步骤 8：离开时在纸上签名，代替下班打卡。

translation.en: (Some were allowed to leave earlier, esp if they weren't comfortable in the dark or didn't still have 6hrs to go).
translation.zh: （有些人被允许提前离开，特别是那些不习惯呆在黑暗中或者不到 6 个小时后就要下班的员工)。
translation.source: (Some were allowed to leave earlier, esp if they weren't comfortable in the dark or didn't still have 6hrs to go).
translation.medium: 有些人得到了更早的释放(特别是那些在黑暗中不能适应或者还有6个小时的路要走的人们)。
translation.reference: （有些人被允许提前离开，特别是那些不习惯呆在黑暗中或者不到 6 个小时后就要下班的员工)。

translation.en: It's really dark, even upfront.
translation.zh: 即使门店的前面也很暗。
translation.source: It's really dark, even upfront.
translation.medium: 前面也很黑
translation.reference: 即使门店的前面也很暗。

translation.en: No way can we let customers just hang out.
translation.zh: 我们不能让顾客随便闲逛。
translation.source: No way can we let customers just hang out.
translation.medium: 绝不能让客户呆在这里
translation.reference: 我们不能让顾客随便闲逛。

translation.en: I'm not sure why some tills still had some power while others didn't.
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么有些收银机仍然有电，有些却没电。
translation.source: I'm not sure why some tills still had some power while others didn't.
translation.medium: 不知道为什么有些现金出纳机还能用其他的没用
translation.reference: 我不知道为什么有些收银机仍然有电，有些却没电。

translation.en: Not sure, but I don't think we had any way of having them pay.
translation.zh: 我不确定，但我觉得可能没法收银。
translation.source: Not sure, but I don't think we had any way of having them pay.
translation.medium: 不知道,但我觉得我们没有办法让他们付钱.
translation.reference: 我不确定，但我觉得可能没法收银。

translation.en: I do think items would scan, but no way would we trust the customers to pay later.
translation.zh: 我相信可以扫描商品，但我们不可能相信顾客以后会付款。
translation.source: I do think items would scan, but no way would we trust the customers to pay later.
translation.medium: 我想项目会扫描,但是我们绝对不会相信顾客以后会付钱。
translation.reference: 我相信可以扫描商品，但我们不可能相信顾客以后会付款。

translation.en: One time it took only like 3 hrs for power to go back on.
translation.zh: 有一次 3 个小时后就恢复了供电。
translation.source: One time it took only like 3 hrs for power to go back on.
translation.medium: 有次停电只持续了三个小时
translation.reference: 有一次 3 个小时后就恢复了供电。

translation.en: They had a few of us stay so if it did, as they were told by the power company it should, we could reopen.
translation.zh: 我们当中有些人被留了下来，如果真的像电力公司所说的那样，我们就可以重新营业。
translation.source: They had a few of us stay so if it did, as they were told by the power company it should, we could reopen.
translation.medium: 他们让我们一些人留下来如果真的停电了就像电力公司说的那样
translation.reference: 我们当中有些人被留了下来，如果真的像电力公司所说的那样，我们就可以重新营业。

translation.en: I don't mind, as long as we have the choice to stay or not, helping out preserving product as best as we could.
translation.zh: 我不介意，只要我们有留下或离开的选择，我们会尽自己所能保护商品。
translation.source: I don't mind, as long as we have the choice to stay or not, helping out preserving product as best as we could.
translation.medium: 我不介意,只要我们有选择留下来或不留下来,帮助保存产品我们尽我们所能。
translation.reference: 我不介意，只要我们有留下或离开的选择，我们会尽自己所能保护商品。

translation.en: Not having a choice, as well as endangering customers, is where I draw the line.
translation.zh: 但是，没有选择，同时又会危及顾客，就触碰到了我的底线。
translation.source: Not having a choice, as well as endangering customers, is where I draw the line.
translation.medium: 在没有选择的情况下危害顾客是我的底线
translation.reference: 但是，没有选择，同时又会危及顾客，就触碰到了我的底线。

translation.en: This Arab state plans to boost trade with Russia
translation.zh: 这个阿拉伯国家计划加强与俄罗斯的贸易合作
translation.source: This Arab state plans to boost trade with Russia
translation.medium: 阿拉伯国家计划与俄罗斯增加贸易
translation.reference: 这个阿拉伯国家计划加强与俄罗斯的贸易合作

translation.en: The United Arab Emirates plans to increase its trade turnover with Russia to $20 billion in the next five years, the country's Foreign Trade Minister Thani bin Ahmed Al Zeyoudi has announced.
translation.zh: 阿拉伯联合酋长国对外贸易部长萨尼·本·艾哈迈德·阿尔·泽尤迪 (Thani bin Ahmed Al Zeyoudi) 宣布，该国计划在未来五年内将与俄罗斯的贸易额提高到 200 亿美元。
translation.source: The United Arab Emirates plans to increase its trade turnover with Russia to $20 billion in the next five years, the country's Foreign Trade Minister Thani bin Ahmed Al Zeyoudi has announced.
translation.medium: 阿联酋计划今后五年将与俄罗斯的贸易额增加至200亿美元，阿联酋外贸大臣丹尼·本·艾哈迈德·泽尤迪宣布。
translation.reference: 阿拉伯联合酋长国对外贸易部长萨尼·本·艾哈迈德·阿尔·泽尤迪 (Thani bin Ahmed Al Zeyoudi) 宣布，该国计划在未来五年内将与俄罗斯的贸易额提高到 200 亿美元。

translation.en: "We are working with the Russian side to increase trade turnover to $20 billion over the next five years and to continue investing in other areas [of economic cooperation]," Al Zeyoudi told RIA news agency on Saturday during a plenary session of the Expo-2020 international forum in the UAE, which had been postponed due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
translation.zh: “我们正在与俄方加强贸易合作，计划在未来五年将贸易额提高到 200 亿美元，并在其他领域（经济合作）继续展开投资合作，”阿尔·泽尤迪于周六在由于新冠疫情而推迟的 2020 年阿联酋国际论坛上对 RIA 通讯社如是说。
translation.source: "We are working with the Russian side to increase trade turnover to $20 billion over the next five years and to continue investing in other areas [of economic cooperation]," Al Zeyoudi told RIA news agency on Saturday during a plenary session of the Expo-2020 international forum in the UAE, which had been postponed due to the Covid-19 pandemic.
translation.medium: 扎伊乌迪告诉俄新社记者，"我们正在与俄方合作，争取在未来5年使贸易额增至200亿美元，并继续在经济合作的其他领域进行投资"。
translation.reference: “我们正在与俄方加强贸易合作，计划在未来五年将贸易额提高到 200 亿美元，并在其他领域（经济合作）继续展开投资合作，”阿尔·泽尤迪于周六在由于新冠疫情而推迟的 2020 年阿联酋国际论坛上对 RIA 通讯社如是说。

translation.en: According to the official, "relations between Abu Dhabi and Moscow are strategic."
translation.zh: 这位官员表示，“阿布扎比和莫斯科之间建立了战略性关系。”
translation.source: According to the official, "relations between Abu Dhabi and Moscow are strategic."
translation.medium: 据官方透露,"阿布扎比和莫斯科之间的关系具有战略意义"。
translation.reference: 这位官员表示，“阿布扎比和莫斯科之间建立了战略性关系。”

translation.en: He noted that up to 90% of all Russian investments in the Arab world are made in the UAE.
translation.zh: 他指出，俄罗斯在阿拉伯世界的投资有 90% 在阿联酋进行。
translation.source: He noted that up to 90% of all Russian investments in the Arab world are made in the UAE.
translation.medium: 他指出，俄罗斯在阿拉伯世界的全部投资中占到90%。
translation.reference: 他指出，俄罗斯在阿拉伯世界的投资有 90% 在阿联酋进行。

translation.en: The UAE also significantly invests in Russia, making up some 80% of all Arab investments in Russia's economy.
translation.zh: 阿联酋在俄罗斯也有大量投资，占阿拉伯对俄罗斯经济投资的 80% 左右。
translation.source: The UAE also significantly invests in Russia, making up some 80% of all Arab investments in Russia's economy.
translation.medium: 阿联酋还向俄罗斯进行了大量投资，占阿拉伯投资俄罗斯经济总量的80%。
translation.reference: 阿联酋在俄罗斯也有大量投资，占阿拉伯对俄罗斯经济投资的 80% 左右。

translation.en: "If we are talking about the number of Russian companies in the UAE, it has reached almost 4,000," Al Zeyoudi stated.
translation.zh: 阿尔·泽尤迪说:“阿联酋的俄罗斯公司有将近 4000 家。”
translation.source: "If we are talking about the number of Russian companies in the UAE, it has reached almost 4,000," Al Zeyoudi stated.
translation.medium: 如果说到俄罗斯企业在阿拉伯联合酋长国的数量，那么这一数字已经接近4000家，扎伊乌迪指出。
translation.reference: 阿尔·泽尤迪说:“阿联酋的俄罗斯公司有将近 4000 家。”

translation.en: According to the minister, the UAE is already investing in several Russian sectors, including the petrochemical industry, oil and gas, the automotive industry and ports, and it plans to broaden this list.
translation.zh: 这位部长称，阿联酋已经在俄罗斯的几个领域进行投资，包括石化工业、石油和天然气、汽车工业和港口，并计划扩大投资范围。
translation.source: According to the minister, the UAE is already investing in several Russian sectors, including the petrochemical industry, oil and gas, the automotive industry and ports, and it plans to broaden this list.
translation.medium: 据部长透露，阿联酋已在包括石化、石油天然气、汽车工业和港口在内的几大俄罗斯产业进行投资，并计划进一步扩大投资规模。
translation.reference: 这位部长称，阿联酋已经在俄罗斯的几个领域进行投资，包括石化工业、石油和天然气、汽车工业和港口，并计划扩大投资范围。

translation.en: In 2020, the trade turnover between the two states reached $3.3 billion, and in the first 10 months of 2021 its volume exceeded $4 billion, reaching a new record, Russian Prime Minister Mikhail Mishustin said last week.
translation.zh: 俄罗斯总理米哈伊尔·米什乌斯廷 (Mikhail Mishustin) 上周表示，2020 年，两国之间的贸易额达到 33 亿美元，2021 年前 10 个月的贸易额超过 40 亿美元，创下了新的纪录。
translation.source: In 2020, the trade turnover between the two states reached $3.3 billion, and in the first 10 months of 2021 its volume exceeded $4 billion, reaching a new record, Russian Prime Minister Mikhail Mishustin said last week.
translation.medium: 到2020年，两国贸易额达到33亿美元，2021年前10个月达到40亿美元，创历史新高。
translation.reference: 俄罗斯总理米哈伊尔·米什乌斯廷 (Mikhail Mishustin) 上周表示，2020 年，两国之间的贸易额达到 33 亿美元，2021 年前 10 个月的贸易额超过 40 亿美元，创下了新的纪录。

translation.en: According to the Ministry of Economics, this year Russia mainly exported mineral products, precious stones and metals to the UAE, while Russian imports from the Arab country included machinery, equipment and vehicles.
translation.zh: 据俄罗斯经济部称，今年俄罗斯主要向阿联酋出口矿产、宝石和金属，而从阿拉伯国家进口的产品包括机械、设备和车辆。
translation.source: According to the Ministry of Economics, this year Russia mainly exported mineral products, precious stones and metals to the UAE, while Russian imports from the Arab country included machinery, equipment and vehicles.
translation.medium: 据经济部称，今年俄罗斯主要向阿联酋出口矿产品、宝石和金属，而从阿拉伯国家进口机械、设备和车辆。
translation.reference: 据俄罗斯经济部称，今年俄罗斯主要向阿联酋出口矿产、宝石和金属，而从阿拉伯国家进口的产品包括机械、设备和车辆。

translation.en: Dallas Cowboys bring benches to Washington, rivalry heats up
translation.zh: 达拉斯牛仔队把长凳带到华盛顿，竞争加剧
translation.source: Dallas Cowboys bring benches to Washington, rivalry heats up
translation.medium: 美国职业橄榄球队"达拉斯牛仔"将替补席运往华盛顿...
translation.reference: 达拉斯牛仔队把长凳带到华盛顿，竞争加剧

translation.en: The visiting sideline at Washington has a familiar home look for the Dallas Cowboys.
translation.zh: 华盛顿的客场对于达拉斯牛仔队来说就是一个熟悉的主场。
translation.source: The visiting sideline at Washington has a familiar home look for the Dallas Cowboys.
translation.medium: 华盛顿的看台上有一种让达拉斯牛仔很熟悉的感觉。
translation.reference: 华盛顿的客场对于达拉斯牛仔队来说就是一个熟悉的主场。

translation.en: After getting word from other teams that the sideline benches at FedEx Field were in major need of an upgrade, the Cowboys brought their own for this showdown game.
translation.zh: 在从其他球队得到消息说联邦快递球场的边线长凳需要升级后，牛仔队自己带来了长凳来参加这场对决。
translation.source: After getting word from other teams that the sideline benches at FedEx Field were in major need of an upgrade, the Cowboys brought their own for this showdown game.
translation.medium: 在得到其他球队的消息说，费德克斯球场的替补席大需要升级之后，牛仔队为这场对决带来了自己的替补席。
translation.reference: 在从其他球队得到消息说联邦快递球场的边线长凳需要升级后，牛仔队自己带来了长凳来参加这场对决。

translation.en: When they arrived at the stadium Sunday, they were already decked out in Cowboys logos and wordmarks.
translation.zh: 当他们周日到达体育场时，长凳上已经加上了牛仔队的标志和文字。
translation.source: When they arrived at the stadium Sunday, they were already decked out in Cowboys logos and wordmarks.
translation.medium: 他们周日到达球场的时候，已经戴好了牛仔队的标志和名字标记。
translation.reference: 当他们周日到达体育场时，长凳上已经加上了牛仔队的标志和文字。

translation.en: The Cowboys heard from the Seahawks, who recently played against Washington on a Monday night and had complaints that the heated benches were malfunctioning.
translation.zh: 牛仔队收到了海鹰队的投诉，海鹰队最近在周一晚上对阵华盛顿队，他们抱怨说加热的板凳出现了故障。
translation.source: The Cowboys heard from the Seahawks, who recently played against Washington on a Monday night and had complaints that the heated benches were malfunctioning.
translation.medium: 独行侠听到了来自海鹰的消息,海鹰队最近在星期一晚上跟华盛顿比赛,并且抱怨热气的替补席有问题.
translation.reference: 牛仔队收到了海鹰队的投诉，海鹰队最近在周一晚上对阵华盛顿队，他们抱怨说加热的板凳出现了故障。

translation.en: Earlier in the week, Cowboys running back Ezekiel Elliott actually commented about the benefits of playing outdoors in colder games, because of the heated benches are beneficial to his knee injury.
translation.zh: 本周早些时候，牛仔队的跑锋艾泽基尔·艾略特说到在寒冷的户外比赛时，加热的板凳能让他受伤的膝盖更舒服点。
translation.source: Earlier in the week, Cowboys running back Ezekiel Elliott actually commented about the benefits of playing outdoors in colder games, because of the heated benches are beneficial to his knee injury.
translation.medium: 本周早些时候,牛仔队后卫伊扎基尔·埃利奥特实际上对在室外比赛的益处发表了评论,因为供暖的长凳对他的膝伤有益。
translation.reference: 本周早些时候，牛仔队的跑锋艾泽基尔·艾略特说到在寒冷的户外比赛时，加热的板凳能让他受伤的膝盖更舒服点。

translation.en: The Cowboys just made sure Zeke and his teammates got that opportunity.
translation.zh: 牛仔队只是希望齐克和他的队友知道这一点。
translation.source: The Cowboys just made sure Zeke and his teammates got that opportunity.
translation.medium: 牛仔队刚刚确保了齐克和他的队友得到机会
translation.reference: 牛仔队只是希望齐克和他的队友知道这一点。

translation.en: This move is just the latest twist in the Dallas-Washington rivalry, one that got juiced up even more this week when Cowboys head coach Mike McCarthy predicted a win for his team, prompting some fireworks back and forth with Washington's Ron Rivera and players.
translation.zh: 这一举动只是达拉斯与华盛顿竞争的最新情况，本周，当牛仔队主教练麦克·麦卡锡预测他的球队会赢时，他们之间的竞争就变得更加激烈，这引发了华盛顿队的罗恩·里维拉和球员之间的激烈争论。
translation.source: This move is just the latest twist in the Dallas-Washington rivalry, one that got juiced up even more this week when Cowboys head coach Mike McCarthy predicted a win for his team, prompting some fireworks back and forth with Washington's Ron Rivera and players.
translation.medium: 这一举动仅仅是最新的一次达拉斯和华盛顿的竞争,一场竞争在本周变得更加激烈,当牛仔队的主教练迈克麦卡锡预测他的球队会赢球时,引发了一些与华盛顿的罗恩里维拉和球员之间的烟花。
translation.reference: 这一举动只是达拉斯与华盛顿竞争的最新情况，本周，当牛仔队主教练麦克·麦卡锡预测他的球队会赢时，他们之间的竞争就变得更加激烈，这引发了华盛顿队的罗恩·里维拉和球员之间的激烈争论。

translation.en: Washington has beaten the Cowboys in consecutive matchups.
translation.zh: 华盛顿队在比赛中连续击败了牛仔队。
translation.source: Washington has beaten the Cowboys in consecutive matchups.
translation.medium: 华盛顿队连续两年击败了牛仔队.
translation.reference: 华盛顿队在比赛中连续击败了牛仔队。

translation.en: It has been more than 30 years since it has defeated Dallas in three straight meetings (1986-88).
translation.zh: 自华盛顿上次在 1986-88 赛季中连续三次击败达拉斯以来，已经过去 30 多年前了。
translation.source: It has been more than 30 years since it has defeated Dallas in three straight meetings (1986-88).
translation.medium: 自1986年至1988年连续三次击败达拉斯以来已经过去了30多年。
translation.reference: 自华盛顿上次在 1986-88 赛季中连续三次击败达拉斯以来，已经过去 30 多年前了。

translation.en: Cowboys fans made up more than half of the crowd at FedEx field, which was evident based on the blue and white jerseys in the stands.
translation.zh: 在联邦快递球场，牛仔队的球迷占了一半以上，从看台上蓝白相间的球衣就可以看出这一点。
translation.source: Cowboys fans made up more than half of the crowd at FedEx field, which was evident based on the blue and white jerseys in the stands.
translation.medium: 牛仔迷占据了费德克斯球场半场以上的观众，这一点从看台上的蓝白色球衣来看非常明显。
translation.reference: 在联邦快递球场，牛仔队的球迷占了一半以上，从看台上蓝白相间的球衣就可以看出这一点。

translation.en: Owner Jerry Jones foreshadowed that earlier this week when he said on 105.3 FM in Dallas, "We have always sold more Cowboys' hats, caps, T-shirts.
translation.zh: 球队老板杰里·琼斯本周早些时候在达拉斯的 105.3 FM 节目中就预告了这一点，他说:“我们总能卖出更多的牛仔帽、帽子和 T 恤。
translation.source: Owner Jerry Jones foreshadowed that earlier this week when he said on 105.3 FM in Dallas, "We have always sold more Cowboys' hats, caps, T-shirts.
translation.medium: 球队老板杰瑞?琼斯在本周早些时候就预示了这一点,他在达拉斯的105.3频道上说道,"我们一直都卖得比较多的是牛仔帽、帽子、T恤。
translation.reference: 球队老板杰里·琼斯本周早些时候在达拉斯的 105.3 FM 节目中就预告了这一点，他说:“我们总能卖出更多的牛仔帽、帽子和 T 恤。

translation.en: We've always had our greatest fan support positive coming from Washington, that's outside the Dallas area.
translation.zh: 在达拉斯以外，华盛顿球迷对我们是最热情的。
translation.source: We've always had our greatest fan support positive coming from Washington, that's outside the Dallas area.
translation.medium: 我们的球迷来自华盛顿,也就是说,他们不是达拉斯的本地人
translation.reference: 在达拉斯以外，华盛顿球迷对我们是最热情的。

translation.en: Outside the Texas area, Washington is where we have the most support of all when it comes to all the things you might count."
translation.zh: 除了德克萨斯州，华盛顿是我们可以收获最多支持的地方。”
translation.source: Outside the Texas area, Washington is where we have the most support of all when it comes to all the things you might count."
translation.medium: 德州以外,华盛顿是我们最有力的支持者
translation.reference: 除了德克萨斯州，华盛顿是我们可以收获最多支持的地方。”

translation.en: Warning of stormy weather as strong winds present 'danger to life'
translation.zh: 暴风天气预警，强风会“危及生命”
translation.source: Warning of stormy weather as strong winds present 'danger to life'
translation.medium: 暴风警报:强风对生命有危险
translation.reference: 暴风天气预警，强风会“危及生命”

translation.en: Storm force winds are set to batter northern parts of Scotland with disruption to travel, especially ferry services, expected.
translation.zh: 强风暴将袭击苏格兰北部地区，预计旅游，尤其是轮渡服务将受到影响。
translation.source: Storm force winds are set to batter northern parts of Scotland with disruption to travel, especially ferry services, expected.
translation.medium: 狂风暴雨将袭击苏格兰北部地区，导致交通中断，特别是渡轮服务。
translation.reference: 强风暴将袭击苏格兰北部地区，预计旅游，尤其是轮渡服务将受到影响。

translation.en: The northwest, Shetland and Orkney will face gusts of up to 85mph overnight on Sunday into Monday morning.
translation.zh: 从周日到周一早上，西北部的设得兰群岛和奥克尼群岛将遭遇时速 85 英里的大风。
translation.source: The northwest, Shetland and Orkney will face gusts of up to 85mph overnight on Sunday into Monday morning.
translation.medium: 西北部、雪特兰和奥克尼将在星期天夜间到星期一早间迎来85mph的狂风。
translation.reference: 从周日到周一早上，西北部的设得兰群岛和奥克尼群岛将遭遇时速 85 英里的大风。

translation.en: The Hebrides, and western coast of the Highlands and parts of Argyll and Bute have been warned to be prepared for flying debris presenting a "danger to life" and causing damage to buildings.
translation.zh: 赫布里底群岛、高地西部海岸以及阿盖尔和比特的部分地区已经收到预警，要做好准备应对飘扬的碎片，这些碎片会“危及生命”，并对建筑物造成破坏。
translation.source: The Hebrides, and western coast of the Highlands and parts of Argyll and Bute have been warned to be prepared for flying debris presenting a "danger to life" and causing damage to buildings.
translation.medium: 赫布里德群岛以及高地的西海岸和阿尔吉尔和伯特的部分地区已经接到警告，应当做好应对飞溅物的准备，因为飞溅物"对生命造成危险"并且会给建筑物造成损坏。
translation.reference: 赫布里底群岛、高地西部海岸以及阿盖尔和比特的部分地区已经收到预警，要做好准备应对飘扬的碎片，这些碎片会“危及生命”，并对建筑物造成破坏。

translation.en: Experts are warning that the bad weather could lead to power cuts, road and bridge closures, and cancellations to air and ferry services.
translation.zh: 专家警告说，恶劣的天气可能会导致停电、道路和桥梁关闭、航空和轮渡服务取消。
translation.source: Experts are warning that the bad weather could lead to power cuts, road and bridge closures, and cancellations to air and ferry services.
translation.medium: 专家警告说，恶劣的天气可能导致停电、道路和桥梁的关闭以及航空和渡轮服务的取消。
translation.reference: 专家警告说，恶劣的天气可能会导致停电、道路和桥梁关闭、航空和轮渡服务取消。

translation.en: It follows two named storms, Arwen and Barra, that brought widespread disruption to large parts of the country.
translation.zh: 此前，两场命名为“亚文”(Arwen) 和“巴拉”(Barra) 的风暴给该国大部分地区造成了广泛的破坏。
translation.source: It follows two named storms, Arwen and Barra, that brought widespread disruption to large parts of the country.
translation.medium: 之前有两次命名的风暴，Arwen和Barra，给该国大部分地区带来了广泛的破坏。
translation.reference: 此前，两场命名为“亚文”(Arwen) 和“巴拉”(Barra) 的风暴给该国大部分地区造成了广泛的破坏。

translation.en: More than 100,000 homes had their power cut off by the extreme damage wrought by Storm Arwen on November 26 and 27.
translation.zh: 11 月 26 日和 27 日，飓风“亚玟”造成的巨大破坏导致超过 10 万户家庭断电。
translation.source: More than 100,000 homes had their power cut off by the extreme damage wrought by Storm Arwen on November 26 and 27.
translation.medium: 11月26日和27日，超过10万户家庭因风暴“阿尔温”造成的严重损坏而停电。
translation.reference: 11 月 26 日和 27 日，飓风“亚玟”造成的巨大破坏导致超过 10 万户家庭断电。

translation.en: Storm Barra disrupted supplies to around 10,000 just 11 days later on December 7.
translation.zh: 11 天 后的 12 月 7 日，飓风“芭拉”中断了约 1 万人的物资供应。
translation.source: Storm Barra disrupted supplies to around 10,000 just 11 days later on December 7.
translation.medium: 十一天后的12月7日，暴风"暴风"影响了大约十万人的食物供应。
translation.reference: 11 天 后的 12 月 7 日，飓风“芭拉”中断了约 1 万人的物资供应。

translation.en: STV weather presenter Philip Petrie said it was very nearly three in a row.
translation.zh: STV 天气节目主持人菲利普·皮特里 (Philip Petrie) 说，这三次几乎是连着来的。
translation.source: STV weather presenter Philip Petrie said it was very nearly three in a row.
translation.medium: STV气象播报员菲利普?彼特里说几乎连续三天了
translation.reference: STV 天气节目主持人菲利普·皮特里 (Philip Petrie) 说，这三次几乎是连着来的。

translation.en: The Met Office were keeping an eye on a low pressure system that is skirting along northwestern areas overnight on Sunday bringing with it very strong winds and squally, heavy showers.
translation.zh: 英国气象局 (Met Office) 一直在密切关注周日夜间沿西北地区移动的低压系统，该系统带来了强风和狂风暴雨。
translation.source: The Met Office were keeping an eye on a low pressure system that is skirting along northwestern areas overnight on Sunday bringing with it very strong winds and squally, heavy showers.
translation.medium: 英国气象局一直在密切关注低气压体系，该体系周日夜间在北西部地区附近盘根错节地出现，并伴有狂风和雷暴。
translation.reference: 英国气象局 (Met Office) 一直在密切关注周日夜间沿西北地区移动的低压系统，该系统带来了强风和狂风暴雨。

translation.en: The Met Office has issued yellow weather warnings for wind with the first coming into force from 9pm on Sunday covering the Western Isles, and parts of the Highlands and Argyll and Bute.
translation.zh: 英国气象局发布了大风黄色天气预警，第一次预警将于周日晚上 9 点开始生效，覆盖西群岛、高地、阿盖尔和比特的部分地区。
translation.source: The Met Office has issued yellow weather warnings for wind with the first coming into force from 9pm on Sunday covering the Western Isles, and parts of the Highlands and Argyll and Bute.
translation.medium: 气象局发布了微风警报,第一批警报从周日晚上9点开始生效,涵盖了西海岛屿、高地和阿尔吉尔和伯特的部分地区。
translation.reference: 英国气象局发布了大风黄色天气预警，第一次预警将于周日晚上 9 点开始生效，覆盖西群岛、高地、阿盖尔和比特的部分地区。

translation.en: "Within this area there is the potential of gusts reaching 80-85mph causing disruption to ferries and also some damage and power cuts," Philip said.
translation.zh: 菲利普说:“在这个地区，风速可能达到每小时 80-85 英里，造成渡轮中断，也会造成一些损坏和电力中断。”
translation.source: "Within this area there is the potential of gusts reaching 80-85mph causing disruption to ferries and also some damage and power cuts," Philip said.
translation.medium: 菲利普说:“这一地区有可能出现80-85米/时的强风,导致渡轮受到影响,并且造成一些损坏和停电。
translation.reference: 菲利普说:“在这个地区，风速可能达到每小时 80-85 英里，造成渡轮中断，也会造成一些损坏和电力中断。”

translation.en: A further warning comes into effect at midnight on Sunday covering Orkney and Shetland.
translation.zh: 下一个预警将于周日午夜开始生效，覆盖奥克尼和设得兰群岛。
translation.source: A further warning comes into effect at midnight on Sunday covering Orkney and Shetland.
translation.medium: 另一项警报将于星期天中午生效，涵盖奥克尼群岛和雪特兰群岛。
translation.reference: 下一个预警将于周日午夜开始生效，覆盖奥克尼和设得兰群岛。

translation.en: "This warning lasts until midday Monday as the centre of the low pressure system moves close to the Northern Isles, again bringing gusts of 80-85mph along coasts and locally in excess of 90mph in some areas," Philip said.
translation.zh: 菲利普说:“随着低压系统中心靠近北岛，这一预警将持续到周一中午，沿海地区再次迎来时速 80-85 英里的阵风，局部地区的风速超过 90 英里每小时。”
translation.source: "This warning lasts until midday Monday as the centre of the low pressure system moves close to the Northern Isles, again bringing gusts of 80-85mph along coasts and locally in excess of 90mph in some areas," Philip said.
translation.medium: 由于低气压中心将于周一中午移动到北部岛屿附近,再次给沿海地区带来80-85米/小时的大风,局部地区可达90米/小时。
translation.reference: 菲利普说:“随着低压系统中心靠近北岛，这一预警将持续到周一中午，沿海地区再次迎来时速 80-85 英里的阵风，局部地区的风速超过 90 英里每小时。”

translation.en: "It is very fast moving though, so will clear away by Monday afternoon, with things beginning to ease and calm by lunchtime.
translation.zh: “飓风移动速度极快，所以周一下午就会消失，午饭前天气会开始缓和、平静。
translation.source: "It is very fast moving though, so will clear away by Monday afternoon, with things beginning to ease and calm by lunchtime.
translation.medium: 周一下午天气就会好转。
translation.reference: “飓风移动速度极快，所以周一下午就会消失，午饭前天气会开始缓和、平静。

translation.en: For the rest of the week things will continue to settle ahead of next weekend."
translation.zh: 在本周余下的时间里，下周末前天气将逐步稳定下来。”
translation.source: For the rest of the week things will continue to settle ahead of next weekend."
translation.medium: 剩下的一周内，情况将继续稳步前进，为下周末做好准备。"
translation.reference: 在本周余下的时间里，下周末前天气将逐步稳定下来。”

translation.en: Yes, I amopening the account
translation.zh: 是的，我正在打开这个帐户
translation.source: Yes, I amopening the account
translation.medium: 我是来开户的
translation.reference: 是的，我正在打开这个帐户

translation.en: Please follow the next process
translation.zh: 请按照以下步骤操作
translation.source: Please follow the next process
translation.medium: 请您继续下一步
translation.reference: 请按照以下步骤操作

translation.en: To repair your account on the android app, please follow the steps indicated below:
translation.zh: 要在安卓 App 上修复您的帐户，请执行以下步骤：
translation.source: To repair your account on the android app, please follow the steps indicated below:
translation.medium: 在安卓应用程序中恢复帐户，请按照以下步骤操作：
translation.reference: 要在安卓 App 上修复您的帐户，请执行以下步骤：

translation.en: Tap the #PRS_ORG# icon at the top of the screen.
translation.zh: 点击屏幕顶部的 #PRS_ORG# 图标。
translation.source: Tap the #PRS_ORG# icon at the top of the screen.
translation.medium: 点击屏幕上的#PRS_ORG#,
translation.reference: 点击屏幕顶部的 #PRS_ORG# 图标。

translation.en: Go to the Home screen.
translation.zh: 进入主屏幕。
translation.source: Go to the Home screen.
translation.medium: 切换到主屏幕。
translation.reference: 进入主屏幕。

translation.en: Tap the Menu icon at the top of the screen.
translation.zh: 点击屏幕顶部的“菜单”图标。
translation.source: Tap the Menu icon at the top of the screen.
translation.medium: 在屏幕上的菜单图标点击。
translation.reference: 点击屏幕顶部的“菜单”图标。

translation.en: Tap Settings.
translation.zh: 点击“设置”。
translation.source: Tap Settings.
translation.medium: 查找设定。
translation.reference: 点击“设置”。

translation.en: Scroll to the bottom and tap Repair your account.
translation.zh: 滚动到底部，点击修复帐户。
translation.source: Scroll to the bottom and tap Repair your account.
translation.medium: 向下滚动并点击修复你的帐户。
translation.reference: 滚动到底部，点击修复帐户。

translation.en: Tap Repair.
translation.zh: 点击“修复”。
translation.source: Tap Repair.
translation.medium: 水管维修
translation.reference: 点击“修复”。
